111.content:
You were walking home from school one day, backpack slung over your shoulder. You spotted someone up ahead, you decided you could use some company and ran up to him. It was a boy around your age of fifteen, he had spiky orange hair that was matted down by the purple headphones he wore that matched his purple shirt and shoes, the only thing not purple that he wore were his shorts.

There was something familiar about this boy, but you couldn't put your finger on it. Suddenly the boy raised his arm and a large portal formed in front of the both of you. You screamed and ran in the opposite direction as the boy laughed derisively at your futile attempt. The force of the suction picked you up off your feet and sucked you into it, along with the orange haired boy. You knew no more after this for quite awhile.


When you finally woke up you found yourself laying on a soft smooth surface. You looked around and saw the boy's face smirking at you. Only he was huge! "Wha-" you began, but his booming laughter interrupted you.

"Silence slave!"

You jumped at his command, but nonetheless you continued to speak. "What do you mean slave!?" He grinned down at your puny form in his hand and made a fist that enveloped you.

"I mean just what I said, You're my tiny slave! You are going to do whatever I say!" He laughed, blowing smelly hot air at you.

"B-but-"

He glared down at you and suddenly tossed you into his mouth! He sloshed you around his hot damp foul smelling cavern of a mouth with his tongue. "Mmmmm." He moaned at your taste. "Please don't eat me!" You scream getting some of his saliva in your own mouth.

Hearing this somehow, he grins and spits your sticky form out into his hand. "Good boy...Now for the introductions....I'm Neku.....Thats Master Neku to you though....And you're just slave.....that okay with you? It is? Okay...first things first...."
111.title: Meeting Master Neku

choices: "...worshiping my ass!" (Drops you in the back of his pants)

1111.content:
As you tried (and failed) to get Neku's sticky saliva off you, you heard the sound of Neku's shoes being kicked off and flung into a nearby wall. It was then you noticed you were no longer outside, but in some kind of abandoned apartment. The walls looked torn and covered with graffiti. Your view of the room suddenly flipped over as Neku tipped his hand and dropped you on one of his socked feet. The soft material of the sock cushioned the fall, but you still wondered why you were being placed on a foot in the first place.

"So, what's it smell like? I haven't taken off my shoes in awhile to check." your giant, teenage master asked from high above. The smell hit you like a ton of bricks as you grabbed your nose on impulse. It smelled like his sock was practically radiating horrible fumes. "Not so good, I take it. Well, that's what happens when you buy cheap shoes like those: your feet practically suffocate."

You coughed and tried to crawl off the sock, but the smell was really messing up your senses. It was also very warm and was causing you to break out in a sweat. Neku laughed as he watched you crawl around in circles before shaking you off his foot like a bug. Before you could pick yourself off the floor, the socked foot came down on your back and compressed you against the ground. The orange-haired boy started to roll you under is foot and even give you a few squeezes with his toes before taking the foot off you.

"You better get used to that, you're my property now. As my slave, you'll also have to put up with a lot of stuff. Like, for example..."
1111.title: Off with the Shoes

11111.content:
"...worshipping my feet!"
You weren't sure you heard him correctly. Did he really mean it? You just stared at your young captor, completely dumbfounded. Surely enough, he lifted one of his feet up, and after a brief moment of struggling with his dirty, sweaty sock he pulled it off his foot. The same he soon did with the second foot. You could smell the cheesy, putrid scent of foot sweat even a few miles away from his feet. Although these were miles to you, to any normal sized person you were only 3 centimeters away from his toes.
"Well? They aren't gonna worship themselves" you heard Neku speak.
"No way!" you said. "There's no way I will serve your putrid smelling, cheesy feet! Clean them up before you shove them into my face, dammit!"
You'd soon regret these words, as you saw his foot slide towards you. The smell had gotten so hard and so intense, it was a bit overpowering. Then you looked at the foot and, well...
Neku had lifted his big toe up, and positioned his foot so that the toe would be right above you.
"I'm not giving you a choice, bug. You're nothing more than my slave, and if you're not going to serve my foot you will die by my foot!"
You watched in horror, at the enormous sweaty and dirty wall of flesh that was Neku's big toe. The smell was so intense you could almost taste it.
"Well, slave? You either walk up here and give it the best rubbing and licking you can, or you get smushed under it!"
11111.title: A slave to a teenager's foot.

112.content:
You were walking home after picking up some things for your mother at the local department store. The plastic bag swung back and forth in your hand. You looked at your watch and sighed. The day was still young, but there was nothing to do. You had no money to rent a movie and your video game system was at the repair shop after your brother wrecked it. With nothing to do, you had been forced to pick up tonight's dinner ingredients for your mom.

"Man, I'm so bored. I wish there was something to do." you groaned as you scratched the back of your head.

"Maybe I can help with that." spoke a sudden voice out of nowhere. It was so surprising that you dropped the bag you were holding. As the contents spilled over the sidewalk, you kneeled down to pick it all up while also taking a look at your surroundings.

"Who said that? Where are you?" The voice chuckled, but did not speak again. You were about to walk away when suddenly your stomach started to hurt. As you reached down to hold it, your head started to ache as well. "Ugh. What's going on? I feel sick!" You started to get dizzy before collapsing on the ground; knocked out cold.

When you awoken an unknown amount of time later, you felt something was wrong. The bag of groceries was gone and the ground didn't feel like a sidewalk. Thinking you had been picked up and placed on a bed or something, you looked around to notice you were still outside. If that wasn't bad enough, your frontal view was blocked by a giant torso! You looked up the white shirt to spot a boyish, smirking face topped with grayish hair. You recognized the giant as Joshua, a character from a video game you played a few weeks back. But why was he so big and why were you in his hand?!

"I can tell by the look on your face you're pretty confused. They always are." he stated, scratching his chin as he reminisced

"Huh? What are you talking about? Why the hell are you so big?!"

Joshua's smirk returned to his face as he peered down at you. "I'm not big, you're small. You said you were bored so I shrunk you and brought you over to my world.â"

"What?! Why on earth would you do that?!"

"Cause I felt like it." He replied, curling a strand of his gray hair around his finger. His smug attitude was kind of annoying. He didn't even seem to care about what he just did. "Anyway, here's deal. You were bored so I'm offering you the chance to become my own personal slave. How does that sound?

"That sounds like a horrible idea!â" you shouted up at him. His expression didn't seem to change at all by your remark.

"Well, that's your opinion and all. I'm not forcing you to be my slave; it's totally your choice, dude." He explained, continuing to stare at you with those piercing eyes of his.

"Okay, in that case" you began to say.

"You also get to choose whether you live or die. Your first choice determines your second, so it's two answers in one. Isn't that convenient?" the white haired teenager smiled down at you, an expression not going with his threat a second before. He continued to smile as he awaited your answer.
112.title: Joshua

1122.title: Refuse and face the consequences.

11223.content:
Before you knew it, Joshua’s hand lowered to the ground and tipped, dropping you on the hard cement. You were still a few feet from the ground when you dropped, so the landing was a bit painful. As you laid there in pain, you noticed a shadow envelop everything. You quickly turned over onto your back just as the shoe of the giant landed on your chest. You yelped in pain as everything other than your head was pressed into the sidewalk.

“How sad.” Joshua said, high above you. “I gave you a chance to live, but you’d rather be a squashed bug.”

“I didn’t choose anything!” you yelled up at him as you tried to struggle free. All Joshua saw of your struggles, however, was your tiny head writhing as the rest of your body remained compressed under his foot. “Let me go!”

“That’s not an option. The options are either living as my slave or dying like an insect. Maybe I wasn’t clear enough? If you want, we can try again. How about that?” The giant sneered evilly, obviously enjoying the control he had over your life. This kid was a sadist. You remained silent, not having any intention of being this jerk’s plaything. When Joshua didn’t hear any response, he simply sighed. “I see. Maybe you need some more motivation.”

The giant Composer moved his foot so your upper body was no longer being pinned, but your legs were still trapped under the trends of his shoe. Joshua gently started to press down on your lower half, putting more strain on them by the second. You grunted in pain as you leaned up and tried to push the shoe off you. Your efforts were useless…the shoe was just way too big for your tiny muscles to move.

“The pain will go away once you submit to me. Just say you’ll be my slave and I won’t hurt you anymore.” small cracks could be heard as your legs were beginning to fail. Tears started to fill your eyes as you bit your lip.

“Stop…your hurting me. You can’t do this!” you tried shouting at him. He just grinned the entire time.

“I can’t? But I already am. You think this hurts? How about this…” Joshua licked his lips as he put all his weight down, effectively crushing your lower body into nothing. You screamed like you never screamed before, but to Joshua it only sounded like a high-pinched squeak. You couldn’t feel anything below your waist, and the pain was unbearable. Joshua lifted his shoe up, bringing you up with it for a few seconds before you fell off with a splat. Through your blurry eyes you could see that the bottom of Joshua’s shoe was covered in a bloody mess, which could only have once been your legs. Joshua put the foot down next to you so you were positioned between both his feet.

“That’s nothing I can’t heal. All you have to do is agree to serve me and I’ll fix you right up. Continue to be disobedient and you’ll be decorating my other shoe. So what’s it going to be?”

Through your immense pain, you were able to choke out a response. A response that would decide your fate.
11223.title: Consequences can be Painful

choices: Joshua puts you in his shoe for the trip.
Joshua puts you in his pocket for the trip.
112231.content:
"O-okay..." you mutter weakly. You can feel your vision start to fade.

"What was that? I didn't cat that; say it again." Joshua commanded, folding his arms and sneering down at you with a smug grin. You wanted to glare up at him but you were too weak to do even that.

"Please...I'll be your slave!" you shout up with your remaining strength. You think you're about to die, when the god-like voice above you answers.

"Good. I knew you'd come around." The Composer squatted down and moved his hand over your body. You thought for a second that he was going to smear your body across the pavement, but instead he stopped inches from your broken form. A white glow started to admit from his palm. The light washed over you and you felt a feeling of complete comfort. It was the exact opposite of what you've been experiencing up till now. You felt this way for only a few seconds before the light faded and Joshua took his palm away. You opened your eyes wide as you noticed the pain was gone. You looked down at yourself and saw your legs, good as new. Even your jeans had been reformed. You smiled and started to touch your leg, making sure they were real. You didn't have much of a chance, though, as two giant fingers grabbed hold of your leg and lifted you clean off the ground. You ascended for what seemed like miles until Joshua held you in front of his young, handsome face.

"Feeling better? Don't disappoint me, and you'll never have to feel like that again. Understand?"

You nodded to your new master. Joshua looked satisfied by your response.

"Good. Now, let's go back to my pad. We have a lot to do."

13.content: The Sonic world is filled with interesting guys. Pick one.
13.title: Sonic The Hedgehog

choices: Follow him and try to get his attention.
131.content:
You were a typical kid with a passion for gaming. Your favorite games were those in the Sonic the Hedgehog series, and your favorite character was the blue blur himself. You thought of the speedy hedgehog as a hero and role model. One day, arriving home from school, you found a package at your doorstep addressed to you. Inside was a note with a lot of fancy words and lettering, but basically explained that you had won a random drawing contest and received a new Sonic game before it had even been announced. Without asking yourself when you had entered such a contest, you immediately searched the bottom of the box until you found a small game case. Your excitement peaking, you open the case without even reading the game’s title and reach for the disk. The moment your fingers touch the surface of the game disk, you feel an electric shock and everything flickers in front of you. You can’t stand on your feet anymore and they give in from under you. Everything goes black and you never feel yourself hit the floor.

Sometime later, you wake up to the sound of something crashing against the floor, followed by another crash and so on and so forth. You’re laying on your stomach with you face staring at a wooden floor. You don’t remember standing on a wooden floor as you slowly sit upright. Your head aches and your eyes are still blurry. To make things worse, that loud crashing noise is getting louder. Soon you notice that the floor quakes each time you hear the crash. You remain confused even when two, large masses of red slam down on either side of you. Your eyes widen in shock as you look back and forth between the two similar objects.

“H-huh?” you mumble before looking around. With your eyes clearing up a bit, everything looks different. This isn’t your house, sure, but why did everything look gigantic!?

“That’s strange. I thought I heard something coming from in here.” boomed a loud, oddly familiar voice above you. You start to shake as you slowly start to look up. The color of red changes to blue, and the blue stretched hundreds of feet high. These red objects, you realize, were shoes. And towered right above you was none other than Sonic the Hedgehog. So many questions filled you mind, but you didn’t give them too much thought. You were simply too frightened by Sonic’s titanic form. One of the bright, red shoes lifted into the air as Sonic took a step forward. You watched the giant hedgehog walk right over you, never noticing your three inch form between his feet. As your fear struck eyes continued to watch Sonic walk away, you tried to think of a course of action.
131.title: An Adventure in a Compact Disk

1311.content:
You figured it was all just a dream... but how could it hurt? Being a fan(atic) of the blue hedgehog, it only made sense to try and run after him(a bit difficult considering that even at walking pace, he vastly outdid your running pace given the scale involved). Considering his personality, he'd probably be willing to help... or at the very least, not hurt you.

Luckily, the hedgehog didn't go out on a run, or you would have been in deep. He instead took a seat at a couch not too far - to him, anyways - from where you were, clicking on the television set as he laid back and crossed his legs. On closer inspection, it could be seen he was already getting bored... the hedgie always having had a habit of losing his sanity if he stayed in one place for too long.

While he was trying to find something interesting on the TV - which he obviously wasn't, given all the rude remarks he was making about the programming, his voice quite clear as he assumed nobody else was in the house - your tiny form advanced across the wooden floor towards the titanic hedgehog.

You had ran towards him in the hopes he would see you(and to get there quickly before he left), but he was so busy fiddling with the stations he didn't notice the three-inch being steadily approaching him. Panting and exhausted, you arrived at his feet, hunched over as you tried to catch your breath...

...A booming sound was heard as he set the remote down, not to watch a channel, but to get right back up. Knowing this was your only chance before he likely went on a run he wouldn't be back from in a while, you shouted at the top of your lungs while jumping, trying to get his attention. From your fanaticism with him, you knew he stood about 3'3'' (though at this size, he seemed larger than that... maybe he was for all you knew. You thought you'd never be able to be sucked into a game with him, either) in comparison to your 3'', so surely there was a chance he would notice you.

Standing up, Sonic was about to take his first step on a trip towards the door... not running simply because he didn't want to tear up the floors.
1311.title: Follow him and try to get his attention.

choices: "...I should bring you to Tails. He'll know more about this than me."
13111.content:
Upon taking his fist step, Sonic happened to look down at the floor by pure chance. He spotted something small and moving down by his feet. Thinking it was just a bug, he was about to stomp it faster than you could say “squish” when he noticed the bug was acting a bit odd. Listening closely, he discovered his name being shouted by the bug. The bug also waving its arms, as if to get the hedgehog’s attention. Sonic squatted down to get a better look at the bug, and sure enough the bug was actually a tiny human!

“Whoa, what are you, little guy?” Sonic asked, staring at you with his bright green eyes.

“Sonic, thank god! You have to help me!” you yell up at him. Before you could start to explain what you needed help with exactly, Sonic grabbed you between two of his giant, gloved fingers and brought you up to his face.

“You didn’t answer my question: what are you?” Sonic repeated, holding you in front of his giant face. You were a bit intimidated under his stare and found yourself trembling.

“I’m a human…” you answer simply. Wasn’t that obvious?

“Haha, a human? I’ve seen plenty of humans before, but none of them quite as small as you.”

“Well, I was shrunk! That’s why I need your help!”

“Really? How’d that happen?”

You were about to explain what had transpired just minutes ago when you realized something: how could you? You couldn’t tell Sonic you had shrunk and been transported to his world by one of his games. He’d never believe he was some video game character!

“Uhh…well…”

“What’s the matter? Cat got your tongue? Do you have amnesia?”

“Uh, yeah! That’s right!” you lie right to Sonic’s humongous muzzle. “I don’t remember how I shrunk, but I know I’m not supposed to be this size. Can you please help?”

“Sure, little buddy, but first…”

If you had stayed unconscious, you probably would have had a quick and painless death. Unfortunately, fate would not allow that and forced you to wake up to this cruel reality. As you stirred awake, you immediately felt the intense pain from your legs. They had been severely injured from the fall. You howled in pain as you just lied there, tears streaming down your face and blood dripping from your ears and mouth. Sonic heard your screams and chuckled loudly.

“You woke up, eh? Good for you.” the giant bully said in a mocking tone. You looked up in the direction of his voice, but did not see his evil face grinning down at you. Instead, you saw the dirty bottom of his bright, red shoe!

“S-Sonic, what are you doing?” you ask, practically choking out the words.

“Oh nothing much…I’m just going to crush you.” Sonic replied in a calm voice, smiling widely. “Better dodge if you want to live, human.” You heard Sonic cackle as his foot continued to decent upon your frail body. You were in a very bad position; your right arm and both your legs were useless. The only thing you could do was roll onto your stomach and use your left arm to drag your broken body to safely. It didn’t take long for you to realize how pointless your efforts were; Sonic’s shoe was just too huge for you to escape this way. Eventually you just gave up and squeezed your eyes shut, wishing this nightmare away.

The pain was still there, so you hadn’t woken up or anything. You thought Sonic’s foot should be on top of you by now, so you turned your head around to see the giant blue runner taking his foot away and smirking down at you with that face you had once loved.

“I changed my mind. It would be a waste to squash you right now. It’s not every day a shrunken human turns up in my house; I have to milk this chance for everything its got!”

“S-Sonic…you said you’d…help me.”

Sonic put his hands on his hips and continued to smirk down at your mangled body. He just stared at you for a few seconds before saying, “I will, little buddy. You’d live a miserable life at this size, so I’ll do you a favor and put you out of your misery…eventually.”

Sonic started laughing hysterically while you stared up at him in shock before beginning to sob again. You were glad to be alive; you still had a life to live. However, if Sonic was just going to kill you later, you would rather just get it over with now instead of going through more painful suffering.
1311111.title: Still Alive...Unfortunately

13111111.title: Dead and alive?

choices: You make it out of Sonic's house.
Sonic pulls himself free in time and shuts the door!
131111111.content:
As you dodged another attempt by Sonic to crush you, you glanced over at the front door and noticed it was open. That was good, since you now had a direct exit to the outside. If it had been closed, things would have been much more difficult. You focused on your door to freedom and dash toward it, occasionally keeping an eye on the floor for a shadow that signaled Sonic’s foot was right above you.

“You’re pretty good at rolling, human, but how long can you keep it up?” Sonic asked mockingly as continued to try and stomp you. After dodging his foot for the eighth time, you began to realize what he meant. All this dodging was taking its toll on your body. Your muscles felt sore and you had slowed down considerably. Sonic, on the other hand, hadn’t even broken a sweat. You watched a shadow fall over you again and tried to dodge, but your legs wouldn’t obey and you ended up falling on your stomach. Sonic smirked triumphantly as he watched you fall and lowered his red sneaker on you slowly. “Did you honestly think you could escape from me? I’m the fastest thing alive, runt.” You tried to crawl out of the way, but soon felt the massive hedgehog’s foot on your back. Sonic slowly began to apply pressure on your minuscule form and you felt pain shoot through your entire body. You screamed in pain and begged him to stop, but the cruel blue titan just pressed down on you more. He moaned, as if in pleasure, as he heard your bones start to crunch and pop. He finally put all his weight on his foot and felt the resistance underneath it just vanish with a final crunch.

“Only one left,” the giant hero cooed as he lifted his sneaker off the floor and inspected your squashed body for the third time. “Then you’re gone.” Sonic chuckled coldly as he scraped your mushy, pasty remains on the wooden floor and watched you reform, clothes and all. You dropped to your hands and knees and panted loudly. The first two deaths had been quick and painless, but this one had been different. You had felt your skeleton collapse on itself…you had felt yourself die. Now you were back to normal and perfectly fine. It felt so weird.

“You’ll have plenty of time to rest in the afterlife, bug.” Sonic boomed as he raised his foot over you, ready to snuff out that last, insignificant life of ours. He stomped down, but you had already taken off again for the door. “What?!” The emerald had not only healed your ruined body, but it also replenished your energy! Sonic cursed at this minor setback, took a few steps toward you, and raised his foot over you again. He was ready to end this little game. With all his speed and power, the mighty blue god stomped down with all his strength. However, with an increase in force comes a decrease in accuracy, and the foot missed you entirely. Instead, Sonic’s red sneaker went right through the floorboards and made hole in his floor. Not only that, but the force of the impact was so great that it swept you off your legs and a few feet closer to the door! Sonic’s eyes widened as he noticed he had failed to squash you and helped you instead. He growled in frustration and moved to end you, but found his foot stuck in the floorboards! He frantically tried to pull his foot free while glaring at you angrily. “Come back here you fucking insect so I can squish you! I’ll make sure your last death is long and excruciatingly painful!”

You ignored Sonic’s voice and focused on one thing: freedom. Your friends, your family, your normal size, your old life. If you could just make it out that door you’d win Sonic’s cruel game and have a chance of having it all back. The outside was so close…you were almost there. The fresh breeze coming in through the door felt so nice…
131111111.title: The Game Called Stomped

1311111111.content:
The smell of fresh air was wonderful. you stopped on the large doormat outside and put your hands on your hips in triumph. You turn around and mocked the giant who lied helplessly on the floor and all he did was angrily stare at you.

'Nyyyyh! Nyyyyh!" you laughed as you pointed and mocked the blue god. He continued to stare at you in anger. Then out of nowhere he began to grin evilly which got you confused. You won the game and beat him why was he smiling? Soon you felt a loud boom behind you and a dark shadow casts over you. You strain to turn around and saw a black hedgehog Giant and his air-shoe only inches from crushing you

"Son-of- a-...." before you can say the last word the colossal Air-shoe stomps down and you flattens with a thoom. " Sonic....are you home?' Shadow said looking in while standing in the doorway. Shadow then noticed his rival laying on the floor laughing hysterically "Sonic.....you okay? and whats so funny?" Shadow asked curiously as he helped the hedgehog who was laughing out of control out of the hole.

"Oh its nothing shadow......heh heh heh you lost you little runt....." Sonic said aside to himself but shadow heard. Shadow just brushed it off not caring at all

"Come Sonic.....Doctor Eggman is attacking the city again" Shadow ordered

"Yeah.....alright! Some more adventure!" Sonic shouted. Shadow again didn't understand when Sonic said "more" but brushed it off again.

The both hedgehogs left the house, both stomping on your already crushed, red past of a body. Shadow didn't notice but Sonic did.

"hold on....i forgot to lock the door" Sonic said smiling a little as climbed the steps again and then he stomped on your body again and smeared it all around enjoying the sound of your bones crunching "heh heh heh......i never lose!......Never!" Sonic stated to himself

"Sonic what are you doing? Come on lets go!" Shadow shouted from the sidewalk "Sorry shadow i just had to crush a pesky bug"

Then in a flash both hedgehogs were gone, leaving behind the red paste that was once your body. Too bad Im sure your friends and family will miss you dearly, only because no one ever saw or heard from you again.......
1311111111.title: Your luck has run out

choices: Sonic drops you into his rank sneaker.
Sonic uses the Emerald to make you pliable, then uses you as chewing gum!
1311111112.content:
You were just a few more feet from the door. A few more feet from freedom. Sonic was stills stuck in the hole behind you and had no way of stopping you from emerging victorious. At least, that’s what you thought before you felt a tremendous gust of wind hit you in the face and blow you several feet backwards! That last thing you saw before you went flying backwards was a blue blur passing you by. As you stand up and hold your dizzy head, you hear the sound of your doom: the door closing. Your eyes go wide as you look toward the door and see Sonic, one hand leaning against the door and the other placed on his hip. He’s grinning at you…a sick and demented grin that you never thought he could make till now.

“Too bad, little buddy, and you were so close too.” Sonic says as he slowly approaches you, cracking his knuckles as he advances. You fall to your knees, no longer having any hope of surviving. Tears seem to automatically fall from your eyes as Sonic’s feet place themselves on either side of you. The sexy blue hedgehog looks down at you with not a glimpse of pity. “You stupid, tiny human. Have you ever heard of the great Sonic the Hedgehog losing? I sure haven’t!”

You know this is it for you as Sonic raises his foot over you. You’re about to become a stain on the bottom of your video game idol’s sneaker. He’ll be running off on his adventures while you’ll be dead and forgotten. You squeeze your eyes shut and cover you head, awaiting the blue god’s judgment…

*ring*

The first thing you think of when you hear this is that Sonic as squashed you and you’re hearing heavenly bells. You open your eyes, however, and discover it’s just his doorbell…

“Fuck, horrible timing.” Sonic curses as he puts his foot down and glances over at the door. Without looking at you, the giant points at you and says, “Stay put. I’ll deal with you in a minute.” before walking toward the door. You do as he says and just sit there, seeing no other choice. There’s nowhere to hide nearby and by the time you did reach anything to conceal yourself, Sonic would be through with the person at the door and come back to stomp you.

The speedy hero opens the door and is met with the vastly more mature face of Shadow. The black hedgehog is tapping his foot against the ground impatiently and seems to be in a hurry.

“What do you want, Shadow? I’m kinda busy…” Sonic says to his black furred friend.

“It’s Eggman, he’s attacking the city again! You need to get over there right now!” he replies, practically shouting in the teenage hedgehog’s face.

“Damn Eggy, he has the worse timing. I’ll be right there, I just need to grab something.”

“What are you talking about?! We don’t have time for that!”

“Just go ahead of me, I’ll be right behind you. Heck, I’ll probably get there before you!” Sonic chuckles as he turns around and walks back into his house. Shadow just rolls his eyes at his rival’s smugness and dashes off, leaving you alone with the blue bully once again. Sonic stands over you and puts his hands on his hips.

“Well, runt, it looks like our little game just got interrupted. Let’s call it a draw, shall we?” he says to you as he reaches down and grabs you with his sweaty, gloved hand.

“D-Does that mean I can live?” you ask, shuddering before your blue god.

“Yeah…for now. However…” Sonic brings you closer to his face and smiles widely, showing his sharp and white teeth to you. “You’re going to wish I had crushed you, human.”
1311111112.title: Saved by the (Door)Bell

choices: After saving the city. Find some of his friends and shrink them too!
13111111121.content:
The blue god Snickers at you as he reaches down and pulls off his sneaker. Sonic pulled off of his shoe and the smell was unbearable, you instantly covered you nose is disgust. "Mhhmmm! smells great!" moaned the blue bully. With his smelly sneaker in one hand and you in the other he held you above is sneaker and realized what was to come. "No! Nooo! please! don't put me in there!" you pleaded. Sonic just showed his trademark grin and dropped you in the shoe. Inside the shoe it was the worst smell you have ever experience! you almost passed out but you were determined to get out of there but then you felt the shoe lower to the floor.

When landing on the floor you immediately look up and saw the hedgehog grinning evilly and slowly bringing is foot down to the shoe "enjoy the smelly ride! runt!" the bully bellowed from above. you instantly ran to the tip of the shoe to avoid being crushed. you helplessly watched the massive socked foot enter the rank prison and slowly approaching you. you tried to step back further but was only in the wall of the shoe. The large socked toes then began pressing you tightly against the wall of the shoe crushing your ribs. You could tell what was worse the pain or the smell. Our supposed hero finally latched his shoe and began to move and stretch his foot and toes around playfully causing you to slide underneath his foot. "Heh heh heh poor little fella, i kinda feel bad for the runt!....." Sonic said lying to himself as he took a step towards the door. You felt the shoe lifting into the air and then crashing down with a thoom. You groaned as all the hedgehogs weight was on you! you weren't crushed because of the squishy insole and his squishy foot itself!

like a complete dick, he stops purposely and put all his weight on his right foot crushing you even more "Huh? what was i supposed to do again?" The sexy blue bully said sarcastically as he knew he was crushing you "oh yeah! the city...right......i swear those humans are so pathetic and worthless. Why cant they just save the city from villains for themselves?" Sonic said annoyed. you couldn't believe at what sonic said. He sounded far worse a villain than doctor Eggman himself. Sonic then was hit with a brilliant idea. He pulled out the chaos emerald and gazed at it........and grinned evilly as he thought of his vicious plan.....
13111111121.title: The smelly prison

choices: Sonic calls one of his friends into the kitchen and shrinks them.
Sonic shrinks all three of his friends at once.
131111111211.content:
As Sonic held the object of great power in his hands, he began to think up a truly evil plan. If having one tiny bug to toy around with was fun, what about a few more? His so called “friends” would finally be useful for a change. Sonic grinned toothily and took off toward the city, wanting to hurry up and take care of Eggman. Once he ad arrived in the city, he heard noises coming from the center of town. He followed his ears until he came across one of Eggman’s giant robots fighting Knuckles. While the red echidna dealt with that, Shadow and Tails were busy directing the humans to safety. Sonic scoffed at their efforts; why worry about the pesky humans? They’d thank us for saving them even if there were a few casualties. Without wasting another second, Sonic joined Knuckles in fighting Eggman. With the blue hero’s help, it only took a minute or two before Eggman’s newest machine was a heap of scraps and the evil Doctor was retreating in his Egg-o-Matic, shouting at the blue menace in anger. With the danger gone, Knuckles walked over to Sonic and put one of his strong hands on his shoulder.

“Those were some nice moves, Sonic. I could have beaten him in one punch, though.” Knuckles boasted. As he said this, Shadow and Tails had finished leading the civilians to safety and joined them.

“It’s about time you got here, Sonic.” Shadow said, folding his arms over his chest and glaring at the blue hedgehog. “What was that about getting here before me?”

“Just ignore Shadow, Sonic. You were awesome!” Tails praised, looking up at his best friend with a smile. “I caught that last move you pulled; it was amazing!”

“What did you expect, little buddy? I’m Sonic the Hedgehog!” Sonic grinned triumphantly while Knuckles and Shadow rolled their eyes and Tails nodded in agreement. “Anyway, what do you guys say we celebrate this victory at my house?”

“That’s a great idea, Sonic!” Tails exclaimed. “We can all chip in and buy a bunch of snacks too!”

“You can count me in.” Knuckles spoke up. “I’m getting tired of guarding the Master Emerald 24/7, so a little relaxation sounds great.”

“I’ll pass…” Shadow muttered. “I have better things to do than hang out with you guys.”

“Oh, come on, Shadow!” Tails looked up at the black hedgehog with puppy dog eyes. “You never hang out with us! Just for a little while?”

Shadow stared at Tails for a few seconds before finally giving in. “Fine, but just for a little bit.”

Tails cheered and the four friends headed off together. Occasionally, Sonic would smirk as he imagined one of his friends a few inches tall and at his mercy. He couldn’t wait to get home and have some real fun. As he walked, he could still feel poor you squirm under his socked foot. You were still alive, but probably in a lot of pain.

*A little while later, at Sonic’s house*

As soon as the four guys entered Sonic’s house, they turned the living room table into a snack table consisting of popcorn, chips and dip, pizza, soda, and other junk food. Tails sat down on Sonic’s comfy sofa and watched one of his favorite movies while stuffing his face with snacks. Knuckles was taking the time to do some exercises while occasionally gulping down a can of soda. Shadow just leaned against a wall with his eyes closed, sometimes cracking an eye open to glance around the room and scoff at Sonic’s design choices. Sonic was alone in the kitchen, busy taking his right shoe off. Once he had tugged it off, he held it upside-down over the kitchen table and watched your minuscule body tumble out.

“Hey there, runt! Did you enjoy the ride?” Sonic asked in a taunting tone. He watched you wobble to your feet while clutching your side, obviously in a lot of pain. “Looks like some of your ribs are broken. Let me fix that for you.” Sonic held out his Chaos Emerald and the same soothingly light from before engulfed your body. Your pain faded away as your shattered ribs healed. “There we go, good as new! I need you in tiptop shape before the real fun begins!”

“What do you mean? What are you going to do to me?” you asked, fearing for your life.

“It’s not just what I’m going to do to you, but also what I’m going to do with my guests.” Sonic pointed in the direction of the living room and cast an evil smile at you. You gaped up at the hedgehog as you understood what he meant.

“No, Sonic, you can’t! You can’t shrink them, they’re your friends! They always stuck by you and helped you as you saved the world!”

“Don’t make me laugh, runt! Those “friends” of mine are a bunch of annoying pests! Knuckles thinks he’s stronger than me, Shadow thinks he’s the fastest hedgehog, and then there’s Tails. That little brat has always followed me around! He’s always calling me over to his workshop so he can show me one of his inventions that I couldn’t give a damn about! I’m going to enjoy putting them all in their place.” Sonic chuckled menacingly as he peered at his reflection in the emerald.

“You…you’re a monster!” you scream up at him, tears streaming from your eyes as you’re forced to see the true nature of your idol. It hurts even more than being crushed under his giant foot.

“I’ll take that as a compliment, kid.” Sonic put his hands on his hips and grinned down at you.
131111111211.title: Saved the City, Now Some Fun...

1311111112112.content:
"Now wait here" Sonic boomed pointing a finger at you. "Hey guys can you come in here please? i need help with something!" Sonic said with an evil grin. "whats up Sonic?" Knuckles asked as he, Shadow and Tails entered the kitchen. Then the blue hedgehog began to laugh deeply while looking into the chaos emerald. "Hey Sonic are you ok?" Tails asked frightened. Sonic just ignored them and laughed louder. "What so funny?" The black hedgehog asked very annoyed. you screamed as loud as you can telling them to run away, but it was useless they couldn't hear you, especially because of Sonic's laughter. "You pathetic fools! you should bowing down to your master!" Shouted the blue hedgehog with power.

Knuckles and Shadow became aware that something wasn't right Sonic or so they think. Tails was extremely frightened, he never heard Sonic laugh so demonically like that nor saw that evil grin on Sonic's face before. " What are you talking about...."your master"?" Knuckles asked with an angry expression. "Heh heh heh Oh! you'll soon find out!" Sonic snickered as he held up the emerald. It began to glow brightly as you watched as Tails, Knuckles and Shadow were heading for the same fate as you. Soon The three began to feel uneasy and then they noticed that Sonic started to get bigger, but he wasn't growing they were shrinking! When the shrinking stopped Tails, Knuckles and Shadow were only a mere inches tall and stared up in terror at the giant blue hedgehog towering over them. They stepped back from the giant as the expression on Sonic's face meant trouble was ahead.

"Oh look! bugs! i think ill crush them!" Boomed the giant sexy hedgehog as he raised he foot over them. Sonic knew they would dodge the stomp but this was only a distraction. Sonic lowered his foot smiling evilly, then Knuckles grabbed Tails by the hand and the three jumped to the right dodging the massive sneaker that crashed down with a loud Boom. Before they could recover they felt a giant gloved fist close around them and they were hoisted into the air. Soon they were met with the Devil's gigantic face, they've never seen such an evil face before especially not from Sonic. For once Shadow was actually scared of Sonic.

The gigantic hedgehog began to squeeze his fist tightly causing his three little friends to scream out in pain which amused the giant. "Look at you three.....squirming like puny insects under my grip! How....fucking.....pathetic!" Boomed the sexy giant. The hedgehog laughed at his victims as he got a glass cup from the cabinet and then went back to the kitchen table where you were. You couldn't believe that Sonic would actually torture someone to death but torture his friends? no one else would have believed it unless they saw it. The hedgehog then dropped his friends on the kitchen table next to you and you watched them cough up blood in pain, it was a horrible sight. "Look at you pathetic insects! Hmph! your all not even worthy of being in my presence" Sonic cooed with a grin. You just ignored his words as you attended to the others. Soon Sonic felt a little uneasy and began to put his hands on his crotch "Oh! i think i had too much soda!. you insects wait here until i get back from the bathroom i gotta take a piss But just to make sure you don't escape" Sonic boomed as he encased all of you in the glass cup on the table "ill be back to have fun with all of you in a bit hahaha" said the blue bully as he was soon gone in a blue flash.........
1311111112112.title: Tails, Knuckles and Shadow are Doomed

choices: Tails makes it to the living room table.
13111111121121.content:
As Sonic left to pee, you looked over the injuries of his three newest victims. They all looked hurt, but it wasn’t serious. They were still able to stand and examine their surroundings.

“I can’t believe Sonic shrank us!” Knuckles yelled, looking as if his Master Emerald had just been broken again. “And who the hell are you?” the red echidna pointed at you and you backed away from his angry stare.”

“Settle down, hot head.” Shadow said as he wiped some blood from his mouth and gazed at you. “Did Sonic shrink you too?”

“Um…no, I don’t think so.” You answer, thinking back to when you first arrived in this world. “I just appeared here at this size. I don’t know how it happened.”

“I see…well, we‘re in this together now.” Shadow turned his gaze from you to Tails, who was still sitting on the ground with tears in his eyes.

“S-Sonic…why?” Tails whimpered, not understanding why his best friend would do this to him.

“Wipe those tears away, Tails! This must be the true Sonic. I always thought he was hiding something…”

“No! This doesn’t make any sense!” Tails shouted, getting to his feet. “Sonic wouldn’t do something like this! Something must be wrong! Maybe Eggman did something to him…or maybe he’s being possessed!”

“I want to hope something’s wrong with him too.” you reply to him, looking equally sad. “Right now we have to get out of here! If we just sit here, Sonic’s going to come back and kill all of us!”

“And what do we do if we get out of here?” Knuckles inquires, folding his arms over his chest.

“I think I may have an idea.” Shadow answered and pointed in the direction of the living room. “I always carry a Chaos Emerald with me. When I got here, I put it down on the coffee table with all the snacks. If we can get over there, I can use the emerald to turn everyone back to normal.”

“Okay, let’s do it!” Tails raised his voice and wiped the tears from his eyes. “I want to get back to normal and do something to help Sonic!”

“Count me in! Maybe a few punches will snap Sonic back to his old self!” Knuckles exclaimed before bringing his fist back and giving their glass prison a mighty punch. The strike was enough to crack the glass a little, allowing Shadow to kick the weak spot and make a small opening for them to escape through. When the four bugs were out of the glass, they ran to the edge of the table and peered down at the ground below.

“Now what?” you ask the other three.

“I can fly us down, but I can only take one of you at a time.” Tails suggested.

“That’ll take too long. Sonic will come back and we’ll all be dead bugs. I have a better idea; you two grab onto me.” Shadow said as he glanced at Knuckles and you. The two of you nodded and grabbed onto the older male’s arms. In the next moment, Shadow jumped into the air and started his freefall toward the floor below. You thought you were going to go splat against the ground, but suicide was not Shadow’s idea. Right before the three of you hit the ground, Shadow released a huge gust of air from his shoes which stopped their decent and let them hover in the air for a couple seconds. Shadow stopped the output and you all landed safely on your feet.

“Wow, that was awesome!” you said, complimenting the Ultimate Lifeform’s quick thinking.

“Save the praise for latter.” was Shadow’s response before he looked back up at the table. “Come on, Tails!”

The young fox looked down for a moment before glancing over at the living room. His face suddenly filling with courage, Tails looked back down at Shadow and said, “I’m going to fly over to the emerald first! I’ll see if I can find it!”

“No, Tails!’ Knuckles shouted up at his young friend. “It’s too dangerous!” Tails did not listen to the echidna as his twin tails began to spin and he took off, racing though the air toward the living room. To a normal sized person, Tails would appear like a slightly oversized house fly…

“What does that kid think he’s going?! Damn him!” Shadow cursed and took off after him. Since he was injured, he could not run at his full speed. He was still much faster than you and Knuckles, who struggled to keep up with the black speedster.

“Sonic sure is taking a long time in the bathroom…” you mumble to yourself, hoping that he’ll take a bit longer. The last thing you wanted was for him to come back and find you all trying to escape.
13111111121121.title: Escape Plan

Sonic was still in the bathroom which was a good thing at the moment. The four of you have made it to the living room with a Chaos Emerald clearly on the living room table. Tails without hesitation flies up onto the living room table.

1311111112112121.content:
“Now, if you bugs don’t have any more complaints, I’d like to have my meal now.” Sonic said as he gave Tails one last devilish look before once again tilting his head back and dangling the innocent fox over his maw. The last thing Tails saw was the wet, dark mouth of his best friend before the pain became too much and he slipped into unconsciousness. Shadow and you watched helplessly as Sonic dropped the young Tails into his mouth and shut it closed. The blue bully swished the tiny morsel around his mouth, getting a good feel of his texture. He began to moan as he took in Tails’ flavor, all while peering down at you with an evil glint in his eye. In order to taunt you further, the cruel giant popped two furry tails out of his mouth and held them with his lips. You turned your head away in disgust as Sonic sucked on the twin tails, getting as much flavor out of his sidekick as possible. Finally, Sonic slurped the tails back into his mouth like spaghetti and used his pink tongue to send the young genius to the back of his throat. One loud gulp later and the poor fox boy’s unconscious body was sent down Sonic’s gullet.

“That’s what you get for trying to escape, freak. You tasted pretty good, though.” Sonic taunted his meal as he patted his flat belly. “One down…three to go.” Sonic looked down toward the table and grinned at Shadow, who stared up at his rival with pure detest.

“You’re going to pay for this, Sonic!” Shadow yelled up at the blue giant.

“Shut up, faker. You’re going to be next!” Sonic replied as he reached down to grab Shadow. The black hedgehog wasn’t one to let his emotions take control of him, though. Instead of being paralyzed with fear and regret, Shadow moved quickly and jumped into Sonic outstretched arm. As he ran up the giant limb, Sonic snarled and put Shadow’s emerald back on the table so he could have a free hand to swat the bug with. Shadow dodged the hand and continued running over the sexy god’s body. He tried using Chaos Spear, but his attacks didn’t even graze the giant.

While the two hedgehogs were preoccupied with each other, you took the chance to run over to Knuckles unconscious body. You tried shaking him awake, but he was knocked out cold. Instead, you slumped one of his arms over your shoulder and hoisted him up.

“We have to find someplace to hide. It’s too dangerous to be out in the open like this.” you say to yourself as you walk away from Sonic’s towering form. Knuckles is heavy (being quite muscular), so your retreat is very slow. It’s better than just standing still and waiting to be captured by Sonic again, though.

Back with Sonic and Shadow, the bigger of the two is starting to get pissed off at the agile little bug. He had dodged every one of Sonic’s attempts to squash him, but Sonic wasn’t going to give Shadow the chance to rest. Finally, one of his strikes almost hit Shadow and the gust of air created from the impact sent Shadow spiraling off his body. Sonic smirked and took the chance to clap his hands together, aiming to squash the pesky faker between his palms. When the teen separated his hands and examined them, he found no trace of Shadow’s remains.

“Where did he go?”

“Don’t underestimate me, hedgehog!” came Shadow’s voice. Sonic looked around to try and find out where it was coming from. “You seemed to have forgotten that I can use Chaos Control without a Chaos Emerald in my hands!” Sonic finally realized the annoying voice was coming from on top of his head. He angrily swatted at the shrunken hedgehog, but only managed to hit himself. Shadow used Chaos Control again to warp down to one of Sonic’s feet. As Shadow stood on top of one of Sonic’s red sneakers, he noticed that Sonic hadn’t immediately noticed where he had warped to. This allowed Shadow a moment of rest and a chance to plan his next move before Sonic noticed him.

This is bad. Being shrunken to this size has greatly reduced my power, not to mention that I‘m injured. I can’t keep using Chaos Control to escape Sonic. I have to make these warps count or else I‘ll be too weak to move. Shadow thought to himself. He didn’t know how many more times he could use Chaos Control, so he had to be very careful using it…

Sonic sat on Shadow for a good while, savoring the fact that his arch rival was suffering under his behind. After a few minutes of just sitting, Sonic heard his stomach gurgle and he touched it with his gloved hand. Looks like Tails was digesting well. Suddenly, Sonic let one rip right on top of Shadow. He smiled and swiveled his butt again. Finally, he picked himself off the faker to get a look at his victim. Shadow was in a critical state; blood was trickling from his mouth and his body looked pretty bruised up. Both his arms looked like they had snapped in several places and his legs had been all but squashed flat. Yet, despite all these injuries, Shadow was still alive and conscious. He probably wasn’t going to last long, so Sonic decided to finish him off quickly.

“Hehe, poor Shadow. You fought well, but in the end you’re going to be nothing but a stain under my ass! See ya, buddy!” Sonic mocked as he began lowering his butt onto Shadow again. He couldn’t wait to twist his butt around and feel the annoying “ultimate life form” crunch. Shadow watched through blurry eyes as Sonic’s blue butt cheeks got closer and closer. Right before they touched him, a loud crash was heard from the kitchen. Sonic peered into the kitchen and whispered, “What are those runts up to?” The blue god stood up, sparing Shadow for now, and glanced down at the broken hedgehog. “I’ll be right back to finish you, don’t go anywhere. Oh wait…YOU CAN’T!!” Sonic bellowed with laughter as he walked out of the living room, leaving Shadow to suffer a little longer.

While Sonic was torturing Shadow, you were busy in the kitchen. After hiding Knuckle’s unconscious body in one of the lower cabinets under Sonic’s sink, you ran into a different cabinet and looked around for something to get Sonic’s attention. As luck would have it, there was a tower of pots and pans stacked up in there. They were dangerously close to the edge and looked like they would fall with just the slightest nudge. You used every ounce of strength in your minuscule body to give them that nudge, causing them to tumble onto the floor and cause a racket. Just as you planned, you heard Sonic’s booming footsteps heading toward you.

“Son of a bitch!” Sonic cursed as he saw the mess you had made. “I had all these stacked up perfectly! How did those bugs manage to knock them over?” The evil hedgehog got on his hands and knees and started gathering all the pots and pans together again. As he did this, you sneaked past him and ran for the living room. If you had learned to do anything well after coming here, it was running. You somehow managed to reach the table before Sonic came back. Unlike Shadow, though, there was no way you could jump on top of it. Your only option was to try and climb one of the legs. You found a leg that looked climbable and immediately started scaling up it. You knew Sonic would be back soon and you prayed he wouldn’t find you. That emerald was your last hope!

13111111121121211111.title: The Real Sonic!

13111111121121211112.content:
“Well, may as well put you with the others. I don’t think they’re in a state where they can say hi, though. You won’t be able to either!” Sonic laughed as he reached down for you. You soon found yourself in the familiar hold that was Sonic’s crushing grip. Sonic brought you up to his green eyes and looked over the last bug, seemingly trying to decide exactly how to consume it.

“Please don’t eat me, Sonic! I don’t wanna die! I just want to go home!” you cry, going into a desperate state.

“Now, now, don’t beg. It makes you look even more pathetic…and even more delicious.” Sonic grinned toothily, showing you his teeth that have been stained with the blood of Shadow and Knuckles. It made him look feral and even more frightening than usual. You squeezed your eyes shut and waited to be thrown into Sonic’s wet mouth. Instead, Sonic released you and let you fall out of his hand. You opened your eyes, expecting to see the hard ground below. Instead you saw…a bowl of onion dip?

You fell into the bowl with a small splash and quickly swam to the surface. As you breathed in fresh air, you saw Sonic plop himself onto the couch and click on the TV to one of his favorite shows. After getting himself comfortable, he took a potato chip out of a second bowl, scooped up some dip, and ate it.

“Mmmm…Tails’ homemade dip is really something! I suppose I should enjoy his last batch…ha-ha!” Sonic chuckled as finished chewing the chip up and reached for another one. After consuming this one, he leaned back on the couch and watched TV. He seemed to be ignoring you, but every now and then he would take another potato ship, scoop up some dip (missing you), and consume it loudly. You wished your death would be quick, but Sonic wasn’t so merciful. He was dragging this out by making you watch him devour the chips, just like he had done to his friends. Just like he was going to do to you. You found yourself thinking about Tails, the last thing he saw being the open maw of the guy he thought was his best friend. You thought about Shadow, the look of desperation on his face as he reached out for you before having his life snuffed out by Sonic’s bottom. You thought about Knuckles, the strong fighter who had been crippled by a mere kick and then painfully devoured by someone he trusted. You couldn’t save any of them…you couldn’t even save yourself.

After a full hour of wallowing in despair, the show Sonic was watching ended and there was only one chip left in the bowl. Sonic picked the chip up between his fingers and peered down at you. You knew what was coming…it was time. Sonic slid the potato chip underneath you and brought your drip-covered body to his youthful face. His mouth curved into a smirk before he spoke.

“Tails was okay, Shadow was great, and Knuckles was…meh. I have a feeling your going to taste better than all of them, human.” Sonic licked his lips seductively, coating them in salvia that was soon going to coat you. Even though you knew it was hopeless, you couldn’t help but beg one more time.

“Please, Sonic! I’ll be your slave for the rest of my life! I’ll rub your feet! I’ll lick them! I’ll lick any part of your gigantic, marvelous body! If you kill me now, you won’t have a tiny bug to play with anymore!”

“What are you talking about, runt? As long as I have a Chaos Emerald, I can shrink any one of my remaining “friends” and play with them. If I ever run out, I’m sure there are plenty of devoted fans out there that would just die for the chance of being my friend.” Sonic explained, taking great amusement in the hopeless look your face showed. “Look on the bright side, kid. You’re going to become part of the great Sonic the Hedgehog, savior of the world!” Sonic used his other hand to gesture down his slim body. Even after everything he has done, you couldn’t deny that he was one sexy hog. That didn’t matter, though! He was no “savior”, he was an evil monster that just hid behind a kind smile. You didn’t want to become part of a monster!

“NO! I don’t-”

Not even letting you get close to finishing your sentence, Sonic casually tossed the chip into his mouth and snapped his jaws shut. You were consumed in humid darkness, screaming your head off, for about two seconds before Sonic moved you onto his molars and started chewing. Your screams became those of agony as Sonic’s perfect, sharp teeth mashed your body into pieces along with the crunchy potato chip. Sonic leaned back on the couch as he listened to your screams get drowned out by his eating. When it was all over, a mixture of mushy potato chip, onion dip, and human mush laid upon his tongue. Sonic swallowed you down and felt you enter his gut. He happily rubbed it while feeling the remains of his four shrunken victims mix together along with the bowl of chips he had consumed. Together it was all digested into a milky soup for Sonic’s body to process.

“Four down…*burp*…none to go.”

131111112121.title: The Ultimate Ass

choices: The three hedgehogs go on a shrinking spree.
Someone else arrives at Sonic's house.
1311111121211.content:
“Any last words, kid?” Sonic asked as he wasted no time in turning around and getting ready to sit.

“No…just do it already.” You reply giving up totally now. There was no way you could escape the wrath of three giant, teenaged gods. You were doomed and you may as well accept it.

“Giving up, eh? Well, in that case I’ll try and make this quick.” Sonic wiggled his butt for you and you thought to yourself that his butt was probably the most sexy out of the three of them. The two others walked over and got ready for your final death. This time, you weren’t coming back. You were going to be turned into a stain that would probably be washed off in the shower. As Sonic’s big, blue ass descended on you, you thought about how humiliating this death was. You had barely lived and the only reason you had lived in the first place was so you could meet you end via the behind of your video game hero? What a shitty twist of fate. With that thought, the blue bully’s ass came down with unforgiving force and everything turned dark…

It wasn’t much later that you started to stir awake. You felt was seemed to be glass under your hands and you stood up and slowly opened your eyes.

“Am I…dead?” you ask yourself. Your vision is still blurry, but you can make out three shapes around you. A black one, a while one, a blue one…oh no. There was no way! You rubbed your eyes, clearing your vision, and saw…

“Hahaha, not yet human! You aren’t dying until your gods say you can!” the giant blue speedster said as he grinned at you though the glass walls of your prison. You just now noticed that you were inside of a glass; you must have been dropped in here when you were unconscious…but why-?

“You’re probably wondering why you’re not a red stain, huh?” Shadow asked, picking the glass you were in up and bringing it to his face. “Isn’t it obvious? Using a Chaos Emerald, we can revive you as many times as we want! You aren’t staying dead until we get bored of you!”

Shadow bellowed with laugher as he shook you around in the glass before placing you back on the table. You looked round again and realized that the three hedgehogs were all sitting at a kitchen table, with you on that table.

“So, what do you want to do with him next?” Silver asks, glancing at his two buddies.

“Well…he tasted so good when he was in my mouth…and that run here did make me pretty hungry.” Shadow replied as he looked at you with a hungry stare and licked his lips.

“Hold on, Shadow!” Sonic said, stopping Shadow’s arm as it reached to snatch you up. “We don’t know if we can revive him if you eat him. The only thing that will be left are his bones in your crap!”

“But I’m REAAALLLY hungry and I’m curious as to what humans taste like.”

“Now that you mention it, I’m kind of hungry too…” Silver sat back in his chair and rubbed his growling stomach.

“Well we both can’t eat him…”

“Hmmm…I know!” Sonic shouted loudly and slammed his fist into his palm. “Why don’t we head into the city and shrink ourselves some snacks? Station Square is full of useless humans and they still owe us for saving their asses a few days ago.”

“Good idea!” Silver shouted back., clearly enthused by his blue buddy’s plan. “We could even bring back some friends for our favorite bug.” Silver turned to you and smiled.

“No! You can’t do that!” you yell, banging on the side of the glass. “They’re innocent people who trust you! You can’t turn them into food! That’s not fair!”

“Did you guys hear something?” Shadow asked his two companions, both whom shrugged. You watched the three giants stand up and make their way out of the kitchen. You could do nothing but watch them leave and hear the front door open and close. You collapsed against the side of the glass, suddenly feeling weak. Was this your fault? Would those three monsters even have the idea to shrink people if you hadn’t come to their world? No one in Station Square stood a chance…

choices: The three playmates crush the last of the humans.
Some of the bugs manage to avoid detection.
1311111121211111.content:
When all of the trio’s shrunken victims, which numbered in the hundreds, were scattered over the floor, the start of the massacre began. The three teenaged gods wasted no time in advancing toward their prey, while most of the humans screamed in terror and ran away from the titanic gods. A few of the humans, who still believed that the three heroes were kind hearted, huddled together and begged the giants to stop. Sonic and his friends didn’t care much for these humans, as they wanted to experience the thrill of the chase. Without giving the group an acknowledging glance, the hedgehogs trampled over them like they were nothing and set their eyes on the real fun.

As the many humans scattered, the trio split up to follow them. Shadow had his eyes set on a fairly large group of people who were heading straight for the door. They believed that if they stuck together they would increase their chances of survival. Unfortunately, it only made them a bigger target. Shadow easily caught up with the fleeing bugs and with one thunderous stomp, crushed over half of them with his left foot. The rest of the humans were send flying back via the shockwave created from the stomp. Those that were not crushed could no longer move, may it be because their legs were broken or because they were frozen by fear. Whatever the reason, it allowed Shadow to easily stomp them one by one. He couldn’t believe how weak the humans were and wondered why he ever bothered to protect them.

Silver was currently following another group of humans, but at a much slower pace. The smaller group looked back at the giant hedgehog and thought that if he continued to walk this slow, they might just escape. Their hopes were crushed, however, when they felt their feet become glued to the floor by Silver’s telekinesis. They were unable to move their legs and could only watch in horror as Silver slowly made his way toward them. It felt like hours to the poor humans before Silver was finally upon them. Pretending he didn’t see the bugs, Silver carelessly stepped on them and easily squished them all. He took a moment to enjoy the sound of them crunching before setting his sights on new prey.

Sonic was just finishing up crushing his second group of tiny humans when he spotted something in the corner of his eye. A lone human had escaped his onslaught and was limping away. Sonic smirked and reached down to snatch up the insect. Once he had him, he brought him up to his handsome face to get a better look. The human appeared to be a teen around the same age as the clerk he had crushed with his butt.

“Please, S-Sonic! Don’t kill me! I’m your biggest fan!” the tiny teen cried.

“Biggest? You just look like another pesky bug to me. Watch how easily I can crush you.” Sonic replied before he started to clench his fist together, making the boy scream in pain as he felt his body compress. Sonic never eased up on the pressure and enjoyed every crack and crunch the human made in his fist. With one last crunch, the teen fell limp in his grip. “Aww…he died already.” Sonic whined before dropping the corpse onto the floor and stomping it flat.

You watched the entire ordeal from your glass prison. You had long since given up on shouting at the three to stop. Your pleas fell on deaf ears. You just sat there with tears streaming down your face as you watched the three gods take innocent life after innocent life. Not once did the titans show any signs of mercy, even if their victims were just kids.

You saw Sonic knock a group of people off their feet and, before they had a chance to stand up, stand over them and sit down. You gritted your teeth at the look of satisfaction Sonic had as he mashed the group into paste under his butt. Nearby, Shadow was forcing a few humans to lick the remains of his last stomp off his shoe. He claimed that he’d let them live if they obeyed him, but it only took Shadow a few minutes to get bored and turn the obedient slaves into another layer of mush on his sole.

Meanwhile, Silver had chased a group of four humans to the other side of the living room. He four insects were starting to tire and Silver took the opportunity to walk over them and bring his ass down on them. Instead of standing up to inspect their remains, Silver slid across the floor and left a streak of blood in his wake.

“Hehe, there’s no escape from Silver the Hedgehog!” the white giant said as he stood up and searched for more people to smush.
1311111121211111.title: A Crushing Spree!

choices: Sonic drops the remote and it slides under the couch...
The trio have some fun with you by making you worship their feet.
13111111212111112.content:
“Hmm…I think that was the last of them.” Shadow spoke up as he finished grounding up three insects under his air shoe.

“I think you’re right.” Sonic replied as he scanned the floor. All he could see were small splotches of blood and the mangled remains of humans. He was amazed that so many people had died in his living room and no one outside heard a scream. None of them had stood a chance against the three of them. They were doomed the moment they decided to visit the mall today.

“Well, I don’t want my living room looking like a bloodbath occurred in it. Silver, do you mind cleaning this mess up?”

“Sure. For letting me have so much fun, I’d clean the entire house of you wanted me to!” Silver replied before he started making his way toward the stairs.

“Oh, and take off your shoes. We’re going to be leaving bloody footprints everywhere if we keep them on.” Sonic said as he began removing his own shoes. Silver took off his, followed by Shadow, and the three tossed their footwear in the corner to be washed later. Moments later, the younger hedgehog came downstairs with a mop and bucket floating around him. Without lifting a finger, the hedgehog from the future began cleaning up any evidence that a massacre had occurred here today.

“Guess I should wash these too.” Sonic said to himself as he looked at his white gloves, which had been stained with the blood of that teen he had crushed.

Unknown to the three monsters, their massacre was not without survivors. During the panic, just two humans managed to hide themselves under the living room couch and avoid the three gods’ sights. They were both teens, one around eighteen while the other just thirteen. They were brothers.

“This can’t be happening, this can’t be happening…” The older teen said to himself as he paced around and bit his fingernails. “Why would Sonic shrink all those people? Why would he kill all of them? It doesn’t make any sense!”

“Adam, what’s going to happen to us?” the younger boy asked from his seated position. His eyes were wet with tears and he was hugging his legs against his chest. “You saw what they did to all those people. They ate them…and then crushed the rest! I-I don’t want to die, Adam!” the thirteen-year-old shook his head and burrowed his face into his hands.

“Calm down, Tom!” Adam said as he shook his brother by his shoulders. “I promise I won’t let anything happen to us. We just have to wait here until they leave. Maybe this shrinking thing isn’t permanent! You can’t give up hope.” The older teen tried to comfort his brother, but the truth was that he was just as scared as him. If one of those hedgehogs found them, they were good as dead.

Suddenly, the two males heard the “roof” of their hiding spot creak. Shadow had just sat down on the couch and was searching for the remote.

“Hey, Sonic, where’s the TV remote?” Shadow yelled to his friend in the kitchen.

“It’s not on the coffee table?” Sonic’s voice called back.

“Nope.” Shadow scanned again and his eyes fell upon you, still trapped in the glass. He grinned at you and plopped both his feet onto the table. His two socked feet were on either side of the glass now, giving you a good view of them. “Hey, Sonic, what should we do with this one?”

“Anything we want, Shads! He’s our little toy to use as much as we want.”

Shadow grinned evilly and said, “Hear that, little human? You’re are slave until we get bored of you. Once we get bored…well…you watched the show, right?”

You stared up at the cruel giant with so much hate that it took every fiber of your being to stop yourself from shouting every profanity you knew at him.

“Well, that’s the last of them.” Silver said as he finished mopping up the floor. Nothing remained of the crushed humans except for what was still stuck to the bottom of their shoes.

“Hey, I found the remote.” Sonic said as he entered the living room, waving the remote in his clean, gloved hand. “It was in the kitchen. I must have left in in there.”

1311111121211111211.content:
Adam didn’t know what to do. He thought that if they had just stayed under the couch and waited, the giants would leave and give them an opportunity to flee. Thanks to dumb luck, here they were; trapped and about to meet their ends. His brother, while his intense crying was understandable, wasn’t helping him think…

“I think the question is, which one should we kill first?” Sonic said, placing his hands on his hips and glancing from brother to brother.

“I vote for the smaller one. His crying is giving me a headache.” Shadow replied, raising Tom up to his menacing red eyes. Tom trembled under their gaze.

“Good idea. There’s always room in my belly for another tasty human!” Silver exclaimed, licking his lips.

“Hey, why do you get to eat him? I was the one who found them!” Shadow replied, glaring at the younger hedgehog.

“If I hadn’t dropped the remote, you wouldn’t have looked under the couch!” Sonic cut in.

“Come on, guys.” Silver tried to calm his two buddies down. “I cleaned up the mess we made all by myself; shouldn’t I get some kind of reward?”

“Hmmm…I suppose you do. Okay, Shadow, give the younger human to Silver.”

Tom’s eyes widened as he realized he was about to become food. He started crying louder and squirming against Shadow’s strong grip.

“No! No! Brother, help! I don’t want to be eaten!” Tom cried, looking over at Adam with total fear in his eyes.

“Oh? They’re brothers?” Shadow inquired, becoming more interested.”

“Awesome! Make sure the older one watches as I devour his little bro!” Silver cackled evilly, imagining the look on bug’s face.

“P-Please, don’t do this!” Adam begged, looking from one hedgehog to the next. “You can do what you want with me, but please don’t hurt my brother! He’s just a kid!”

“Let me think about that.” Shadow answered, making a face like he was thinking really hard. “Nah.” Shadow then flicked the wrist that had Tom in it forward. It took Adam a second to realize that his brother was no longer next to him. He had been tossed through the air toward Silver. The giant time traveler opened his mouth wide to receive the incoming meal.

“NOOO!!!” Adam shouted, as if his voice could somehow will Tom to a halt. Alas, everyone watched as the thirteen-year-old was caught by Silver’s open maw. The hedgehog teen slammed his jaws shut, sealing his meal in darkness. Adam watched helplessly as Silver swished his brother around in his mouth, moaning at the boy’s fresh taste. Tom was still screaming his head off, which were occasionally interrupted when Silver smacked the boy into his cheek with his pink muscle.

“No…don’t…let him go! Please stop! Stop!” Adam begged, banging his fists against Shadow’s hand. The black hedgehog responded to the plea with a tight squeeze, making the older teen yelp in pain.

“Shut it, human. We’ve crushed and eaten plenty of people’s brothers. What makes yours so special?”

Inside your glass prison, you decided you could no longer watch this and buried your face into your arms. The cruelty of these three titans knew no bounds. You thought that Sonic falling on his face was an act of karma, but it was just another act of cruel fate. Maybe it would have been better if these brothers had been crushed like everyone else. At least it would have spared them this torture…

Eventually, Silver had sucked all the taste he was going to get from the kid’s body and decided to silence his screams for good. Giving Adam a smirk, Silver tilted his head back and swallowed. The older brother watched, speechless, as the hedgehog’s Adam’s Apple bobbed up and down and his throat carried his brother down to his stomach in the form of a small lump. As soon as the lump faded into Silver’s chest, Adam felt like he had been hit by a truck. He gave up all struggles within Shadow’s fist and just stared at Silver in disbelief.

“Ahh, that his the spot.” Silver commented as he rubbed his stomach. “They taste just as good when you swallow them whole, and I can feel him struggling in my gut!” Silver chuckled as he focused on the movement in his belly. Tom was still crying out to his brother, but his words no longer reached the outside. Silver’s thick abdomen took care of that.

“N-no…Tom…” Adam sobbed, burrowing his face in Shadow’s glove. “I promised nothing would happen, but…I couldn’t do anything. I’m so sorry, Tom!”

“Ugh, the bug’s getting my glove all wet!” Shadow shot the grieving teen an annoyed glance. “Let’s hurry up and dispose of him too.”

“Should I just crush him?” Sonic asked. “Or do you want to eat this one?”

“Wait…” Adam picked his head up and stared straight into the face of Silver. “Please…eat me too! I don’t want my brother to die scared and alone. Let me at least comfort him. I’m begging you!” Adam had given up all hope. If they were going to die here, his only request was that they to die together.
