131111112121111121111.content:
As soon as the three spoke those words, the Chaos Emerald began to release a radiant light. The light did not fill the entire room, but seemed to be concentrated around the three hedgehogs. You, unnoticed by the three hedgehogs, were also caught in the light. You shielded your eyes from the brilliant light, while Sonic and his buddies stared into the chaotic energy with grinning faces.

“I think it’s working!” shouted Silver. “I can feel so much power swelling up inside me! It feels like it’s going to explode!”

“I feel it too!” Shadow shouted, looking down at himself.

“Quick, let’s put our shoes back on before we start growing. I don’t want to be stomping around in my socks!” Sonic said. The three comrades darted toward the corner of the room where they had tossed their shoes and quickly slipped them back on. No sooner had they put them on there feet that they began to expand. Their bodies quickly filled the room, which as far too small to contain their giant forms. “Ugh…I guess we should of grown outside…” Sonic groaned as his back pressed against the back wall. If they didn’t break out of the house soon, they were going to get squashed…

Outside, a random passerby was on his way to the city when he noticed Sonic’s house. The blue speeder’s home was atop a hill near Station Square. The man stopped his car in front of the house and peered at it like it was some kind of national monument.

“Wow, this is Sonic the Hedgehog’s house! I better get a picture to bring home to the kids.” the man told himself as he opened his glove compartment and searched for the camera. As he did this, he suddenly heard a loud booming sound come from Sonic’s house. The man turned back to see the roof of the house completely destroyed. Not only that, but three figures were emerging from the building. Judging by their odd colored bodies and spines, they could only be Sonic, Shadow, and Silver! But why were they growing?!

“Hehe, so much for your house, Sonic.” Shadow said as his expanding foot mowed down the kitchen.

“Don’t sweat it! The humans built me this house for being their ‘savior‘. I can always make them build me a new one.” Sonic replied as he and Shadow stepped out of the house, knocking down a few houses in the process.

“In that case, you won’t mind if I do THIS?” Silver asked just before slamming his butt on the remains of the house, crushing it and everything inside. He laughed as his quickly expanding ass overtook the rubble. It had been so easy to destroy it…to think they had just been sitting in there!

As their growth into true giants came to a halt around 300 feet, Sonic noticed the passerby parked in front of his house. With a smile, the blue giant stomped over to the driver. The man quickly stepped out of his car and gazed up at the blue titan with awe.

“Is that really you, Sonic?” the man asked.

“How many other sexy blue hogs do you know?” Sonic answered, putting his hand son his hips.

“Um…why are you do big? Are you preparing for another big adventure?”

“Oh yeah, REAL big.” Sonic chuckled and lifted his shoe over the man’s car. With one stomp, the vehicle was crushed flat under Sonic’s red shoe. The man was flung away from the wreckage and landed next to Sonic.

“W-why did you do that?!” the man yelled up at the blue hero.

“Hey Sonic, who are you talking to?” Shadow asked the teen, walking over to him and unknowingly stepping on the poor man. Shadow was so powerful now that he didn’t even feel the man crunch under his air shoe.

“Hehe, no one.” Sonic replied. He looked back at Silver, who was still smothering his house with his butt. “Come on, Silver, let’s go ‘visit’ the city!”

“Yeah!” Silver jumped up and was about to walk over to his two friends when he noticed something move near his foot. He looked down to see a human crawl out of the ruined house, somehow having survived his butt. It took a moment for Silver to realize who the human was.

“Hey everyone, it’s our favorite bug!” Silver called out as he reached down and grabbed you. Sonic and Shadow came over and peered down at you.

“Hey, it is! I totally forgot about him. The Chaos Emerald must have grown him too.”

“Congratulations, kid, you’re back to normal!” Sonic laughed as he took you out of Silver’s hand and gave you a quick squeeze. You glared up at the giant SEGA mascot, but didn’t say anything. Yes, you were back to your original size, but now they were huge! Nothing had actually changed! “We’re going to have some ‘fun’ in the city; wanna come for the ride?”

There were a few moments of silence where you thought Sonic was expecting an answer from you. Before you could utter one, he said, “Haha, you thought you had a choice, didn’t you?”

Sonic held you closer to his body and released you. You screamed as you plummeted toward the ground, but in your desperation you managed to grab handfuls of Sonic’s fur. You pressed yourself up against the huge mass of blue as you clung to it for dear life.

“Hold on tight, little bug! Wouldn’t want you falling!”

The three giants turned their attention to Station Square. With excited grins on their faces, the trio began the short trek toward the city. They were about to have a lot of fun at the expense of several million insects.

13111111212111112111112.content:
“Hey, guys, remember this place?” Sonic asked as he and his two companions surrounded the Station Square mall.

“It’s the mall, but it’s so much smaller now!” Silver replied as he bent his knees and got a closer look at the large building. “To think, we caused complete mayhem inside here just an hour ago!”

“And now we’re going to do it again!” Shadow said as he cracked his knuckles. He noticed the front entrance to the mall open and a woman walk out. The woman took one look at the three giants, screamed in horror, and ran back into the building. “And would you look at that! There’s people inside it again.”

“Hehe, stupid humans! You’d think they’d avoid this place after everyone suddenly disappeared, but just an hour later it’s packed again! This place is like a magnet for humans!” Sonic said, shaking his head at the inferiority of the human race.

“Works for me. Now we have an entire building full of tasty snacks!” Silver cried out in joy as he began tearing off the roof to the mall. The tow other hedgehog gods helped him and in a matter of seconds the roof came flying off like cardboard. The giants peered into the building, seeing all the humans on the top floor stare up at them in awe. Only when Silver reached a gloved hand into the building and scooped up a handful of people did the humans begin to panic. Silver stuffed the humans into his maw and chewed them. He moaned as he felt them crunch under his teeth and fill his mouth with their tasty insides. “Shrunken or not, these humans are the best thing I’ve ever eaten!” Silver shouted out loud, causing a few chunks of people to spew out of his mouth.

“Eww, Silver don’t talk with your mouth full!” Shadow scolded the younger hedgehog.

“Sorry, sorry.” Silver muttered after swallowed the remains in his mouth. He wasted no time in gathering up a second handful and depositing it into his mouth. Sonic and Shadow mimicked him and snatched up human after human until the entire first floor was empty. Sonic responded to this dilemma by rearing back his fist and punching a hole into the floor. He then tore out the top floor, exposing the next area of the mall underneath it. Some shoppers had been buried alive by rubble when Sonic destroyed the above floor, but most were still alive and fresh for eating. When the hedgehogs had eaten their way to the last floor, they found it empty of any living meat. That’s when they looked to their feet and saw the humans fleeing to their cars.

‘Quick, catch them before they all escape!” Sonic yelled as he began snatching up potential snacks. The three gods split up and stomped through the parking lot, catching prey with one hand and holding them in the other. Most were caught before they got to their vehicles, but some managed to start up their cars and drive off. The hedgehogs still managed to catch some of these vehicles and pluck their human drivers and passengers right out of their seats. After a few minutes, the parking lot was empty except for several cars that were or were not crushed flat by the giant speedsters. The trio walked back over to the mall and sat down on it, crushing it completely under their butt cheeks. Station Square mall, once a popular place for people to go, was gone…just like that. The rubble was uncomfortable on the hedgehogs’ butts, so they got up and looked for another place to sit down and enjoy their meal.

Once they seated themselves in the parking lot, the trio began chowing down on their captured snacks. Humans were a lot like candy to the three gods; they could be consumed in a variety of ways. Instead of just munching the humans to pieces, the hedgehogs came up with several other ways to enjoy their tasty treats. They sucked on them, swallowed them whole, crushed them before slurping the remains up, and even bit off their heads and sucked out their insides. You had to watch the entire display from Sonic’s waist…they way Sonic grinned every time he took an innocent life just to fill his stomach. It was disgusting and wrong.

Silver’s next victim was a small child, no older than eight. The boy stopped his whimpering for just a moment to beg for his life.

“Please, Mr. Silver, don’t eat me! I want to grow up to be just like you.”

But Silver wasn’t listening. He was too busy glancing over at Sonic and Shadow. The two hedgehogs were sitting next to each other and whispering while giving him weird looks. It was really suspicious…

“I wonder what they’re talking about…” Silver pondered before popping the screaming child into his mouth and crunching him between his molars. As he did this, Sonic got up and approached him.

“Hey, Silver…”

“Yeah, what is it?” Silver asked as he tossed a teen into the air and caught him in his mouth.

131111112121111121111121211.content:
You hated these three giants more then you hated anyone in your life. However, you hated and feared the idea of dying by their hands even more. You still had a life to live; why should it end here? You felt bad for those two brothers and everyone else that had lost their lives to these three, but why should you surrender yourself to their fate? You should honor the victims by living and remembering them. Then again, your future didn’t look very bright. Even if you did help Silver, Sonic would just put you back on himself and possibly kill you later. He might accidentally crush you when he lies down to sleep. If you wanted to live, you had to get away from them…

“I’ll help you…but only on one condition! After I get the knife out, I want to be set free.”

“What? No way!” Sonic responded instantly. “Why should we let a bug like you escape? The deal is you either help us and live a little longer, or refuse and die right now!”

“Then you can kill me right now, because I’m not helping! In the meantime…” You pointed a finger at Silver. “You can keep that knife lodged in your tongue and suffer! As long as it’s in there, you won’t be able to eat any more people! You probably won’t be able to kiss Sonic either.”

“Sonic, he’s right…” Silver mumbled, wincing because it hurt just to talk. “Let’s just agree with his demands. There are plenty of pathetic humans on this planet!”

“I suppose your right…” Sonic replied, not seeing much harm in letting one human free.

“I for one am against this!” Shadow shouted, shaking his fist in anger. “We’re supposed to be gods! Gods who kill the weak humans, no matter how young or old they are! Gods who can brush off a military attack like it’s nothing! Are we seriously going to let one stupid kid go free? Let’s just squish him and find another human to help us.”

“Look around, Shadow. The immediate area is completely leveled. If there are any survivors, they’re probably buried under tons of rubble. Even if we did find someone alive, they’d probably in too much of a panic to listen to us.”

“Ow! Sonic, it hurts so bad!” Silver cried, clasping his mouth in pain.

“Hold on, Silver. Just open up for a second.” Sonic said as he brought you over to Silver, who strained to open his mouth wide. Shadow scoffed and turned away.

Sonic quickly deposited you into the maw of Silver and you bounced up an down. You couldn’t believe you were inside his mouth…you never believed you’d be in here unless he decided to eat you. Silver, still in pain, was constantly moving his tongue and making it hard for you to get around. You scanned the giant muscle thoroughly until your eyes fell upon the knife. You crawled over to, disgusted by the mix of saliva and blood that was covering you. When you reached the knife, you saw that it had made a nice gash in the hedgehog’s tongue. You thought about slamming down on the knife, causing the giant unbelievable pain in the process. While that would be fulfilling, it would also doom you for sure. You set your mind on living, so you grasped the knife tightly by the handle and started to pull. Silver responded by groaning in pain and thrashing his tongue wildly. You held onto the knife for dear life to avoid being thrown around the wet cavern. After several seconds of agony for Silver, the knife finally came out. Seconds later, Silver spat you into his hand along with some blood.

“Did he get it? “ Sonic asked, concerned.

“Yeah…” Silver mumbled, his tongue still a little sore. He placed you on the ground and turned back to Sonic. “It still hurts a little, but it should heal by tomorrow.”

“Come on, lets go find a river or something to wash your mouth out with.” Sonic comforted his friend and wrapped his hand around him. He guided Silver away outside the city, leaving Shadow alone with you. The black hedgehog glared down at you.

“Well? What are you waiting for? Get out of here!”

You stared up at Shadow, half-expecting him to lift his foot and crush you like a bug.

“I said go, before I change my mind!” Shadow shouted, stomping his foot and sending a tremor through the earth. You got the message and ran down the destroyed street, still grasping the bloody knife in your hand. “If we ever see you again, we’ll treat you just like any other bug! Remember than!”

Shadow turned away from the fleeing human and looked off into the distance. There was still plenty of Station Square that was still standing…perhaps he’ll let off some steam before the others get back.

155221112121221221122.title: One way out now (graphic)

choices: Sora wakes up, and remembers you.
Sora wakes up and forgets that you're between his cheeks.
1552211122.content: You blush slightly as you ask him:"Uh, would it be ok if I sleep between your buttcheeks?" You then look up and notice that Sora's blushing but also grinning. He then says: "Sure, little buddy, just let me pull my pants down and then you're ready to check in at Hotel Sora!" He said, while pulling down his pants , giving you a nice view of his shapely behind. You blushed even harder at this sight, until Sora grabbed you and and said: "Have a nice rest, little buddy!" before placing you inbetween his cheeks and laying down himself, falling asleep quickly.
1552211122.title: Go someplace else.

choices: Try to contact one of the giant boys
1552212.content:
After a casual glance for the source of the tiny sound he heard Sora shrugged and leapt back to his feet and resumed his position next to Riku. Although you were disappointed to have slipped your hero’s notice, upon further thought you realised it was probably for the best. At his massive size Sora could crush you without even noticing. You shivered at the thought, you were sure Sora wouldn’t do something like that ….. at least not on purpose.

You had been so absorbed in this miraculous turn of events, that you hadn’t even taken in your surroundings. Pulling your eyes away from the seemingly sky high giants you gasped in horror as two dark humanoid figures moved towards you. You were about to yell for help when one of them spoke, “Is that really you man”? You recognised the voice, Jason one of your friends but how could it be? Trying to comprehend the situation you looked down at your hands, only to find them stained a beetle black colour. “Its me Jason, and this Kyle, come on man you know us” Jason pleaded with you. On closer inspection he was right, while lacking their usual complexion and hair colour these were indeed your friends.

Calming down slightly after the barrage of events you began to consider the situation. Somehow the three of you had not only been teleported to the world of Kingdom Hearts but also shrunken and seemingly as a side effected dyed. You looked up at the Behemoths that were Sora and Riku, at this size and with this colour you realised to them you looked just like bugs.

“What should we do” it was Kyle who spoke this time his voice quavering. You all looked at each other and considered.
1552212.title: Sora Doesn't See You

choices: His stomach is growling, he’s hungry
It’s lower down, he has to fart
15522122.content:
“We should wait and watch for a bit” you decided, not having any better ideas Jason and Kyle agreed. Sora and Riku just sat and watched the sky occasionally making conversation. It should have been boring to the shrunken trio, but watching skyscraper sized boys even just lazing about was amazing. Finally Riku leapt off the branch he was sitting on, his feet impacting with what seemed to be an earthquake. “I’m gonna invite Hayner and get everything ready for the get together” Riku said casually as he began to stroll in the direction of what you could only assume was his home. “You mean your playdate” Sora teased, a toothy smile splitting his face. “You know your part of it too” Riku retorted dryly before continuing.

“Okay enough” muttered Jason “I’m gonna talk to him”. Before you could stop him your friend was climbing up a sheer wall of bark to the branch Sora reclined on. You watched jaw open, it seems you not only looked like bugs but could move like them too. ‘well at least there’s one advantage’ you thought before following Jason.

Making it onto Sora’s branch Jason’s enthusiasm was immediately replaced with embarrassment. Sora’s legs were draped over either side of the branch as he laid on his back seemingly dozing. This position gave Jason a full view of Sora’s crotch. Blushing furiously Jason took a step forward just as you and Kyle peeked over the edge of the branch having finished you ascent.

Suddenly a massive rumble louder than any thunder you had ever heard began to emanate from Sora.
15522122.title: For now plan and observe

choices: Follow Sora and help your friend
Its too risky, try something else
155221222.content:
Sora’s butt sounded a massive, at least to the tinnies poot impacting Jason with gale force winds well if winds smelt like shit. The branch shook not just with the boy’s flatulence but also his awakening. It seemed while dozing Sora farted himself awake, an act which in other circumstances may have been comedic or cute proved hazardous to the three bugs. You and Kyle were able to hold onto the edge of the branch but Jason felt the full force of Sora’s expulsion and his sit up.

“Man where did that one come from” Sora muttered wafting the air around his nose to disperse the stink. “Might as well meet up with Riku, I wonder if Hayner is over yet?” he mused to himself before leaping off the branch and taking off at a brisk pace.

“Where is he, is he okay?” Kyle asked you his face full of panic. You watched Sora leave desperately trying to compose yourself after the traumatic event that had been a young boys fart. For the first time since this started you were thankful for the transformation as you caught a glimpse of a black dot clinging to Sora’s pants. It appeared the fart and Sora’s movement had launched Jason into the air and as he fell screaming he managed to cling to his unknowing tormentors pants.

You felt a hand on your shoulder and looked, Kyle’s panic had been replaced with determination. “We have to follow him and save Jason” he said clearly trying to keep fear out of his voice.
155221222.title: Casual gas or deadly storm

choices: Riku doesn’t see the black spot on Sora’s pants
Riku’s eyes travel south, bug Jason is discovered
1552212221.content:
“We’ve got to save him” you tell Kyle steeling yourself mentally for what was to come. For the second time since all this started you were grateful for your transformation, as you could move much faster now you were shrunk. However you couldn’t shake the thought of just how much you looked like a bug scuttling along at that speed.

....

Sora reached Riku’s house without issue and gave a courteous knock before proceeding to let himself in. Meanwhile on Sora’s left butt cheek separated from the smooth flesh by a thin layer of cloth, Jason clung for dear life. While the stinky wind of Sora’s fart had long since dispersed, Jason considering his size and proximity was still forced to inhale the fumes. Truth be told Jason probably should have let go, his new bug like body may be able to survive such a large fall but a combination of blind panic and the fact he was still being effected by Sora’s rectal release kept him from thinking straight.

“What took you so long Sora?” Riku said playfully mocking his friend as Sora entered the living room. “this wasn’t a race” Sora huffed, “That’s what all losers say” Riku replied with a grin. Sora swung around turning his back to Riku giving a comical ‘hummmph’
1552212221.title: A precarious position

15522122212.content:
Riku’s eyes narrowed as he spotted the tiny creature clinging to Sora’s pants. With one swift movement Riku pinched the bug between two fingers and pulled it off, pinching Sora’s rear as well. Sora swung back around his indignation real, “What was that?” he spluttered. “You should thank me man, I saved you from this possible deadly critter” Riku said holding the struggling black dot up for Sora. “Man what a weird bug” Sora observed looking with both disgust and curiosity. Jason was trying to yell, but his chest was being compressed by Riku’s fingers and even if it wasn’t he didn’t know if they could hear him. “Hmmm” Riku mused “usually your supposed to squash bugs …. but maybe we can have some more fun”.

Outside Riku’s house you and Kyle had finally reached the door. “Ready” you asked Kyle, not sure yourself but before he could answer you were both struck by tremors. Suddenly the ground was enveloped by a massive shadow. Suddenly remembering Sora and Riku’s conversation you looked up to see Hayner towering above you.
15522122212.title: Trouble on two fronts

155221222122.content:
“What kind of fun?” Sora asked his curiosity piqued. Riku paused for a moment considering, before sprouting a sinister smile. “I think this poor bug deserves some fun after clinging to your disgusting butt” Riku mused. Sora huffed indignantly “my butt is not disgusting” he said matter-of-factly having already forgotten his latest wind breaking session. All his outburst received from Riku was a deadpanned look. Bodily functions were inevitable subject for any two people spending a significant amount of time together, adolescent boys even more so. While Riku was far from a prude and had a relatively strong stomach even he found Sora to be excessively vocal about his body and its …. ‘expulsions’. Whether it was his sweaty feet, itchy armpits or latest dump, Sora kept everyone in the vicinity informed regardless of if they were interested or not.

It was the memory of Sora describing his early morning bowel movement that gave Riku the idea. “I think the bug might enjoy some fun tummy time” Riku said to his still pouting companion. Just from his smile Riku knew Sora was interested, it wasn’t surprising considering Sora was still so immature he played with his food on occasion, speaking to it about ‘tummy time’. “That sounds fun” Sora considered patting his flat stomach and envisioning its interior as a colourful bouncy castle. “But it’s not really food, is it” Sora said having second thoughts. Riku smile ready to play his trump card “Well whatever you want to put in your mouth is technically food, but I guess if you’re too scared” he teased smirking at Sora’s now indignant expression.

Riku’s casual grip was crushing Jason making it difficult to even think. All he could ascertain was that these two behemoth boys were snapping casually at each other while his life hung in the balance. Finally Riku’s grip loosend enough for him to comprehend what was being said.
155221222122.title: Sora and Riku’s fun

1552212221221.content:
“Tummy time”, two words Jason never thought he would be scared of now terrified him to the core. Riku continued to smirk as he handed the helpless “bug” to Sora. “Hey little guy,” Sora said, his visage while gentle still terrified Jason. Sora’s grip was slightly looser than Riku’s allowing Jason to scream out “please don’t eat me”. Although he couldn’t make out the words, Sora got the message from the bugs flailing. “Don’t worry buddy I won't chew you” Sora cooed, “you're just gonna got to my tummy, you’ll be safe and warm and I won't be hungry, isn’t that a good deal” he rationalised.

Riku couldn’t help but snicker, even if the bug somehow survived he would end up being squeezed out of Sora’s butt and Riku had more than enough experience with that fart factory to know what a terrible fate that was. “okay down you go” Sora told his captive as he raised Jason above his mouth. For a moment Sora paused and Jason allowed hope to flare in his heart until he heard the rumble. Opening his mouth even wider Sora belched loudly, blasting Jason with air from his gut. “Sorry about that, just gave you a little preview,” the brown haired boy said with an adorable smile. “One trip to my tummy coming up” Sora announced before dropping Jason onto his tongue. Sora swished Jason around his mouth as Riku grimaced. He expected Sora to swallow not taste it, he really was just a kid playing with his food. Thinking about what the bug had in store Riku smiled again thinking “that’s the least of what you're about to go through”.

Just as Sora pulled Jason to the back of his throat to swallow Hayner burst into the room. “You have a real pest problem you know,” he said with disgust. In his surprise Sora?
1552212221221.title: Tummy time

15522122212211.content:
Jasons scream was unheard as Sora swallowed reflexively, his throat muscles pulling the bug boy into his oesophagus. Sora coughed at the sudden movement, grabbing his throat, he felt the bulge as Jason slid into his gut.

“Well there’s one less pest to worry about now” Riku commented smiling. Hayner looked puzzled for a moment, but upon seeing Sora rubbing his neck with one hand and his belly with the other he put two and two together. His face creased in distaste, “You ate a dirty bug, that’s disgusting” he said. “Not as disgusting as it’s going to be tomorrow” Riku chimed in. Sora merely stood there puzzled, clearly not comprehending the effect his digestive tract would have on the little bug. “Anyway, I saw a couple more on my way in, tried to squash em but they were damn fast” Hayner explained, a look of distaste edged on his face. “maybe they should join their friend?” Riku suggested slyly, but before Hayner could voice his disgust Sora piped up “I think one's enough, besides he can go see his friends when he comes out” Sora said cheerfully. “I don’t think his friends will want to see him when he ‘comes out’,” Riku said smiling.

Meanwhile, outside the house, you and Kyle are preparing to rescue your friend, the only clue to his fate the resounding sound of a loud burp.
15522122212211.title: GULP, swallowed Jason

choices: Just three boys having a fun night (Sora, Riku and Hayner POV)
155221222122111.content:
It’s too dangerous right now, we’ll have to wait till it’s dark. You try not to shudder as a belch rings out, you couldn’t believe that you were reacting to bodily functions like they were explosions. Besides you Kyle was shivering, his eyes darting all around. “Hey don’t worry it’ll be fine we’ll save Jason and make it out,” you tell him, trying to convince yourself at the same time. “It’s just” he stuttered, “I thought they were heroes, I really liked them,” he said almost sobbing. “They are if they knew we weren’t bugs they would be helping us right now,” you told him firmly with confidence you didn’t feel. Thinking about it, you did remember your brother having to pee once and sidling over to an anthill, drenching the bugs in his piss. You quickly shook your head as the image of Sora standing over you with a goofy grin while unzipping his pants forced its way into your mind. You pat kyle on the back and try to reassure him “maybe they figured out he’s not a bug, maybe he’s having fun with Sora right now”. He looked up at your wiping his face with his sleeve, “Do you think we could have fun with Sora too when this is over?” he asked. “Absolutely,” you tell him, giving him a hug.

Meanwhile
155221222122111.title: Wait till dark

choices: Jason’s Preview aka Sora takes a dump
1552212221221111.content:
Jason was in what he could only describe as hell. He had felt the crushing wet embrace of Sora’s throat muscles pulling him deep into the boy. While the trip had only taken moments it felt to Jason like a lifetime. He felt relief for a split second when his body was freed from the oesophagus’s embrace only to find a fresh hell. Slimy, humid and filled with half-digested mush, the organ treated Jason like any other piece of food. His body was hurled around by the churning and the acid already started to burn his skin.

Outside, none the wiser to the torment he was inflicting on the creature within him, Sora enjoyed himself with his friends. Switching from energetic tackles and leaps which served to throw Jason around even more to laying back and watching TV and letting Jason simmer. In another bout of energy, Sora had tackled Hayner and was trying to pin him to the ground. This was proving difficult as Hayner took Sora’s challenge seriously, despite his obviously playful intent. Not helping the issue was Riku, who stood back and watched, while occasionally dropping a comment that antagonised one or the other to increase their efforts, entertaining him more. Meanwhile, in Sora’s belly Jason had lost any sense of direction, he wasn’t sure whether he had been tossed around too much or the acid had finally eaten away at his senses, unfortunately, it was the former. Feeling his guts rumble Sora grinned and flipped over shoving his rear end against Hayner’s head. “Time for my special move” Sora giggled, pausing for effect “Wind Breaker Blast!”. Sora blasted Hayner with a particularly loud and wet fart. With a massive push, Hayner threw Sora off him and rolled away gagging. Inside his unwitting killer, Jason felt the entire stomach shake at Sora’s butt blast. He was sure the force of the gas had broken his already partially dissolved bones. He felt like crying, maimed by a fart while not even near it, at least not yet. Before he could dissolve though Jason had one more show to experience.

“Man that one stank,” Sora said while fanning his rear. “You think?” Hayner snapped maintaining as much distance between himself and Sora as possible. “Maybe that little bug disagreed with you” Riku posed his somewhat sadistic smirk returning. “maybe, do ya think he wants to come out already?” Sora wondered. “Nah, why would he, it’s a rollercoaster ride, I bet he’s having the time of his life on the Sora express,” Riku said, his condescending tone completely lost on Sora. “please don’t encourage hi” but Hayner was cut off by Sora farting again. “Well looks like somethings leaving anyway, back in a minute I gotta take a dump,” Sora told his ‘eager’ audience. “Thanks for sharing,” Hayner said in the most sarcastic tone he could muster, only for Sora to say “Your welcome” before dashing off to the restroom.
1552212221221111.title: ‘GURGLE’ Jasons tour (Jason POV)

choices: More bugs? The rescue Jason mission
15522122212211111.content:
Jason was unable to comprehend what the muffled voices outside his organic prison were saying, the only thing he understood was the reverberation of Sora breaking wind. What was left of his brain imagined the sound and smell based on his previous experience, being blasted by Sora’s ass on the outside seemed absolutely heavenly compared to what he was enduring now.
Sora having no comprehension of the torture he was inflicting strode casually to the toilet, whistling tunelessly to a song in his head. Now away from the sounds of Riku, Hayner and the television, Jason could hear his captor’s song the annoying whistling punctuated by a childish sing-song “Gotta poop”. Why? Jason thought to himself, the last thing he understood before leaving this world was his fate. Sora the hero, that goofy and fun character he had spent so much time with, had eaten him alive, digested his body and was going to shit him out later.
What Jason didn’t know, not that it would have made him feel better about his situation, was that Sora was blissfully ignorant of the truth. He thought he was giving an insect a trip through his gut, not a person and even then he assumed the bug would exit tomorrow, a little smelly and dirty but ready to go on with its life. As he hovered over the toilet he thought to himself you’re lucky I got you before Hayner stomped you flat’ and with that thought, he brought his butt down.

As his backside ornamented with brown hairs touched down on the porcelain he felt a cold shiver up his back. “Alright, come out” Sora told himself, flexing his toes as he began to push. As Sora’s muscles clenched to evacuate his bowels, Jason could feel the stomach contract and the boiling mass of acid around him start to lower. It wasn’t long before he found what was left of himself facing a massive fleshy pink sphincter. In one swift motion, it yawned open and sucked in digested mush before closing again. Unable to move his broken body Jason was forced to watch the great pink hole open and close again and again, drawing closer every time. Jason couldn’t help but imagine another sphincter belonging to the boy, one that was at that moment opening.

With a grunt, Sora pushed, his pucker opening with a burst of smelly wind. Now the path cleared, a thick brown log began to ease its way out of Sora. Having completed the initial push Sora relaxed and allowed gravity to pull his turd out. With a goofy smile he leaned back stretching his arms, the sudden movement caused his anus to close dropping the poop with a satisfying plop into the water below. With that initial release, it was Jasons turn to enter Sora’s lower levels. With a final yawn the sphincter before him opened, sucking him along with other digested mush into the first length of Sora’s small intestine.

After a few more grunts and plops, Sora lifted himself off his throne with a relieved sigh. Without looking he grabbed a handful of toilet paper, leaving a barren role and wiped half-heartedly, his efforts leaving a noticeable residue on some of the brown hairs close to his butt hole. He would end up scratching himself later and telling his friends about the itch, only to receive exasperated looks from Riku and Hayner.

Pulling up his pants Sora looked into the bowl as if expect something, but found only the usual logs. Feeling the emptiness in his belly he put two and two together and smiled. “Guess I’ll see ya tomorrow buddy, sorry about the smell but I can’t help it” and with that Sora exited the bathroom.
15522122212211111.title: Jason’s Preview aka Sora takes a dump

155221222122111111.content:
While Sora was evacuating his bowels, both you and Kyle snuck into the house, preparing to rescue Jason, unaware of his present location in Sora’s intestine. Feeling more apprehensive than ever before in your life, you grab Kyle’s shoulder and take a deep breath before telling him the plan. “Look, man, I know how this is going to sound” you start, fear already edging itself on his face. “But I think it would be best if we split up” Kyle looks dumbfounded at the suggestion, but before he can say anything you add “At this size we’ll only be a ‘bigger’ target together, this way if one of us gets caught, we still have a chance”. Kyle looks like he still wants to argue but just swallows and nods. At that moment the sound of a toilet flushing rang out, loud as thunder and with that you and Kyle take off in different directions.

In the entertainment room, Hayner sat with his brow furrowed as he stared intently at the cards in his hands. Across the table Riku just smirked, allowing a card to drop from his hand in clear view of Hayner. “Oops” smiled Riku as he picked the winning card back up. “I will beat you,” Hayner said with a determination suggesting a life or death battle rather than a simple card game. “Sure you can,” Riku told his opponent, enjoying his mental domination far more than he probably should of. Their game of strategy and finesse was interrupted when Sora walked into the room refreshed from his latest dump. “Man my butts itchy,” he said offhandedly scratching his rear. “Maybe if you wiped properly” Riku suggested as Hayner made a rather convincing gagging face. “I wipe fine,” Sora said waving away the comment with one hand as he scratched his ass with the other. “Anyway,” he said realisation striking him “Maybe that little bug can help next time, you know since he’s coming out that way” Sora grinned, obviously proud of the idea.

Hayner was about to tell Sora that disgusting little thing wouldn’t be in any condition to help him when Riku silenced him with a look that said: “don’t ruin my fun”. “Yeah I bet after the ride you gave him, he’d do anything for you even wipe your nasty ass,” Riku said sarcastically. Missing the sarcasm, Sora retorted “my ass isn’t nasty and besides if he has fun coming out, I’m sure he won’t mind staying for a bit” confident in his logic.

While this discussion was going on, a single black spot could be seen on the carpet. Kyle fell to his knees, tears rolling down his face. He knew where Jason was now.
155221222122111111.title: More bugs? The rescue Jason mission

1552212221221111111.content:
Kyle just knelt there on the gigantic carpet, time seeming to stop. He had crept around hoping to find Jason, maybe playing with giant boys turning their terrifying experience into a brilliant one. But now Kyle knew where Jason was, as the three giants played unaware of their sadism Jason slid further and further into the depths of Sora. Kyle’s tears had begun to make a sizeable, at least, to him puddle on the ground but he made no effort to move. Try as he might Kyle couldn’t help but imagine his friends torment, the sound of peristalsis inaudible outside except for a low grumble would be deafening, each contraction pulling him deeper, extracting his essence and turning him brown. Finally he would be packed into a log with all the rest of Sora’s food, indistinguishable apart from a few bones. That would be it, a boy with all his life ahead of him reduced to a lump of waste, the only confirmation of his existence a wrinkled nose and a giggle at the sound he made impacting the toilet water.

While time stopped for Kyle, the giants continued to go about their business. Eventually, Sora was sent to grab some drinks, although the trouble he was having with this simple task made it seem more like an epic quest. Now that the spiky haired boy was out of earshot Hayner turned to Riku and spoke: “Why do you keep egging him on?”. “Because it’s fun” came Riku’s predictable answer “anyway the only reason your not on board is because messing with bugs grosses you out”. “Well they are dirty and you shouldn’t be roping that idiot into it” Hayner nodded in the direction Sora had set out. “Well I think everything that comes of Sora is pretty dirty and you only have a problem because your sensitive” Riku twisted the knife verbally with a knowing smirk. Hayner scowled as Riku pushed his buttons, adding “Its okay you know,
everybody poops”. Before Hayner could lunge at his manipulative friend Riku’s eyes widened in surprise before narrowing. “Speaking of Bugs” Riku pointed, expertly diverting Hayner’s attention to the small black object on the carpet.

It was at this moment time started again for Kyle and he looked up at two gargantuan boys, both staring intently at him.
1552212221221111111.title: Kyle at the boys mercy

choices: You dash madly in any direction (a chance)
15522122212211111111.content:
Kyle looked up at the two behemoths sitting across the room, their eyes fixed on his insignificant form. Hayner’s face twisted in distaste at the creature before him, while Riku merely smiled having defused the situation between him and Hayner. For a moment Riku considered using this bug in some sort of scheme, however, his plotting was interrupted by Hayner who leapt to his feet intent on crushing the disgusting bug.

Although the distance between Kyle and his attacker seemed vast, the giant cleared it in just a few steps. Despite the how dire the situation was, Kyle couldn’t help but be amazed seeing the massive form above him. Legs and feet were now inspiring and terrifying structures, the change in perspective was even now still difficult to process. But luckily for Kyle instinct kicked in and he bolted forward, his new form granted him increased speed which allowed him to slip between Hayner’s legs. The downside of this was that his scuttling, the beetle black form could not be anything but a bug to the giants. Kyle thought to himself if I can just make it past the table out the door then “SLAM!”. Kyle’s vision was obscured by a massive object blocking his path. It took him a second to realise, that it was Riku’s shoe. At his position, he couldn’t see Riku smirk as he blocked off the exit. “Here I trapped him, even you should be able to hit this one” Riku called across the room. Turning around Hayner’s face was now contorted in both anger and disgust as he strode over.

Riku watches intently as his companion raises his foot dramatically, preparing to crush the insect.
15522122212211111111.title: Hayner and Riku vs Kyle

choices: It’s too dangerous, one of you has to get out right?
155221222122111111111.content:
As the monstrous darkness that was, in reality, a boys shoe descended on him, Kyle slumped to the ground defeated. Time seemed to stretch in his last moments, allowing him to absorb the situation. He couldn’t say he thought his death would mean something to these characters, who had saved countless worlds and battled monsters. But to be nothing more than an annoyance, a stain on the ground, surely he deserved better than that? “At least” he consoled himself “I got it better than Jason”. He imagined Sora squatting, his goofy face straining as he pushed out length after length of waste. With that small comfort, he was crushed by an unimaginable force, his body exploding into an unrecognisable splatter decorating the bottom of Hayner’s shoe.

“Uhhg” Hayner spat as he raised his foot to look at the stain the bug left. “Well, what did you expect?” Riku said exasperatedly, as Hayner grabbed a nearby tissue and began to wipe up the mess. It was at that moment that Sora walked back in, clutching a can of soda his quest complete. “What happened why I was gone,” he asked as Hayner continued to dab his shoe with tissue paper. A sudden smile crossed Riku’s face “Oh we found another bug who wants to have a good time, but he’s stuck to Hayner’s shoe”. Hayner’s face glowed red with anger as Riku spoke while Sora merely stood and listened with a goofy grin. “So you have to lick…” Riku was interrupted by Hayner tackling him to the ground.

The echo of that tackle resounded throughout the house, alerting you to the giant’s whereabouts.
155221222122111111111.title: There is no escape

1552212221221111111112.content:
Alone in the lair of three giants, jumping at the earthquakes their roughhousing makes, you finally give in to fear. You curl up in a corner, your mind filled with hideous visions of what could have happened to your friends. As hours passed you desperately will yourself to get up in the vain hope you can save Jason and Kyle. But every time you pluck up the courage a raucous laugh or a hearty belch freezes you in place and you're beset by more horrific visions.

Riku yawned loudly as he surveyed his work. Both Hayner and Sora were passed out on the couch and floor respectively. He smiled, congratulating himself for so expertly pitting them against each other till they dropped from exhaustion, now the main bed was all his. He noticed one of Hayners legs was draped over the side of the couch, a tiny splotch of red still on his shoe. Riku was surprised he missed that and made a mental note to bother him about it tomorrow. For a minute he considered the creature’s fate, he would have felt bad for anyone being trodden on by Hayner, but it was just a dirty little bug after all. His thoughts were interrupted by a deep gurgling from the boy spread out comically on the floor. If he was going to feel bad about anything it would be that, he’d take Hayner’s foot over Sora’s gut any day. But the enjoyment he got out Sora’s lack of knowledge outweighed any sympathy he could have for a bug. Unlike Sora, Riku had a basic understanding of anatomy, so by his estimate, the bug Sora swallowed should be nearing the end of the small intestine. Drained of any nutrients what was left would be pushed into the colon and formed into a thick brown log, ready to be evacuated from Sora’s rectum the next day. Riku’s thoughts were interrupted by a long low hiss, followed by a juicy pop. Almost on cue Sora had farted in his sleep, his face melted into a satisfied grin. Riku took that as his cue to exit before the smell of the quiet, at least by Sora’s standard, fart caught up with him. As he left the room he swore he could hear Hayner mumbling angrily in his sleep.

Walking down the hallway to the bedroom lit only moonlight Riku stared at the floor. His eyes were half closed and he was ready to drop off to sleep until he noticed a fuzzy little spot in the corner of the hall.
1552212221221111111112.title: It’s too dangerous, one of you has to get out...

15522122212211111111121.content:

Usually the processes would have been much slower giving the behemoth serpentine organ time to extract water from the waste. This time it seemed Hayner’s self-preservation instincts had kicked in, ready to purge Sora’s “meal” as quickly as possible. You could hear the echoes of Hayner grunting in discomfort, but this gave you little satisfaction. While the process certainly wouldn’t be pleasant, in the end all your tortuous journey would amount to would be a wasted hour on the porcelain throne and a moderately sore backside. Deep inside your shit filled psyche the dim rays of hope shone through, but the idea that your ideal would be over so easily was difficult to comprehend at this point.
1552212221221111111112122111121221111122.title: Into the shit factory

1553121.content: You wandered around the seemingly endless grasslands before you. You had no clue how you got here or where here even was. But everything about this unfamiliar land only made you more nervous. The general lack of people or animal life. The fact that the grass almost went up to your waist. Wherever you were, you knew you wanted to find shelter quickly before night fell. But before you got much further, the sky around you darkened. Though you noticed the sun was still up, a quick look behind you revealed a terrifying sight. There was a gigantic person behind you. Utterly massive. They appeared to be male. But compared to you they were like a building. Worse they seemed to be staring right at you. You wanted to run but your legs remained still as you looked up at the massive person eyeing you.
1553121.title: Shrink in Hyrule Field

Your legs finally worked enough to run, but the beast laughed and slammed a boot in front of you, stopping you immediately. “Here’s something you don’t see where day?” It said in a deep, mocking tone as his thick fingers plucked you up. “Going to get a lot of use out of you runt.” And with that the moblin lowered you

155331221.title: Yes

1553312212.content:
You groaned as you regained consciousness and light hit your eyes. The past few hours were a blur as you just remember a black void overtaking you. For some reason you felt different and this feeling accelerated as you felt a strange sudden series of rhythmic ground shakes. The ground vibrated more as the sound of something big collided with the ground. You were shocked as the booms stopped and a loud voice suddenly came from above as the area darkened.

"Well well what do we have here~"

Turning around you gasped at the sight before you. A giant pair of brown shoes with metal tips rested in front on you. Connected to the shoes were two long and tall black clothed legs leading up to a giant currently bending over. The giant had on a fine suit and a fedora over his bright green hair, his face had a smile like that of a snake as his yellow eyes looked to have cruel glee inside.

The green giant suddenly squatted down and put his chin in his palms, all while observing you like a curious child.

"My, I've never seen someone as small as you!", the giant gave a toothy smirk as his yellow eyes seem to glow. He brought up a fingerless gloved hand to his fedora and lightly tipped it. "Oh I haven't introduced myself! You shall refer to me as Hazama."

You were about to speak in a attempt to get answers but stopped as Hazama quickly held up a finger to stop you.

"Your name.......is not important. After all, I'd rather my playthings remain nameless~"

That sent a chill down your spine and froze your body as the smirking face was covered by Hazama's palm approaching. You grunted as you were imprisoned in a large fist with only your head sticking out. Color drained from your face as Hazama brought you to his eyes and you could see them narrow as he licked his lips and resumed his snake like grin.

"Hmmm yes we are going to have a lot of fun. I trust you'll be a good playmate.", Hazama's voice turned more sinister as he lifted his heel up and grinded his shoe into the floor. "If not......well my shoes will look good with some red!"

Hazama closed his eyes and giggled as if this wasn't a cruel situation. Question is will you be a plaything?
1553312212.title: Hazama
